comments: I like the concept so far. I always wanted to play Sims on the go; now I can. I wonder if this game simulates life accurately. You can't have a life sim game without being able to make your avatar a member of the LGBTQA community. This is why I like Second Life. It allows me to be me (gay and proud) and doesn't judge. Will definitely add five 🌟 s if this feature is added along with In-game events that allows you to pursue your chosen lifestyle.

ANYONE WHO GIVES THIS GAME A LOW RATING NEEDS TO SIT DOWN . I love that u have more customization with face and body structure similar to the way you do on Sims 4. The graphics in general are nice. My favorite part is that it's online. I love being able to chat with other Sims users and add them n stuff. Also am glad its not in real time ... I hate having to wait hours on FreePlay to get stuff done. This game is best. Lovelovelove

I was so excited that the game is finally released untill when i want to start the game, the game starts with just the opening EA and Maxis title and then the game close it self. Is this a bug? My phone works well with other heavy games but how it cannot run The Sims Mobile?? Please fix this and i will change my rating! I use Lenovo Vibe K5.

So far so good. Its better than the Sims Freeplay. I'd love it more if it was more like the actual sims. Please change the way this game is. Make it to where we can cook, and choose our sims personality traits, have babies, die lol/legacies, go to work for 8 hrs and actually make a decent amount of simoleons, actually have freedom you know? The actual sims gameplay!!! I love the task list and how we do have to unlock new worlds and items, but it'll be more exciting to unlock stuff to me if this game was more like the original sims. If we had the opportunity to play all day non stop like the original sims, I believe everyone would enjoy the game more. Please make a change to the game and make it more like the actual sims!!!

It's not everything I wanted, that's for sure. This is a great game and I really enjoy working aspect is fun. The rest is boring. Little customization for sim, cannot interect with others like I thought and have to level up to customize house which is sad. I wish we could start with a little more, even have to unlock our personality. Whats up with that? Overall this seems like a really good game but its not the sims I was expecting

In short.. been waiting to see what this had to offer.  Not a bad game. Granted it is way Better than "sims freeplay" however I expected more from EA. It's a nice app. Gameplay is good. Graphics are better than I thought. The in app purchases are what will get you.  For me though the Sims pc is where it's still at, for me anyway nothing beats the PC Version either Sims 3 or 4 Both are very good.   But there's enough here to tickle anyone's fancy. Hats off to the devs on this mobile game version!
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and décor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims’ appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. SHAPE YOUR SIMS’ LIFESTYLE Guide the stories of your Sims’ lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. PLAY TOGETHERHost and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people’s Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!____________Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comVisit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiriesEA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

comments: I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game
Game is very addicting but after a little while of playing you can't hit jump or land! Maybe just me? Also, I don't want to pay for upgrades. Should be merit based on how well you race.

Disappointing...the game would easily be 5 stars, as it is very fun, but once you reach a certain point, it becomes pay to play as you need gold to upgrade your bike to stay competitive with the CPU rider.  Can't even play anymore because it's impossible to progress any further.

comments: Good looking game ruined by slow combat.   You have 4 team members in the beginning, each with 3 abilities. But only one ability can be used, and everyone has to wait 5-6 second global cool down to be able to use a next skill. Global CD on top of the native cool down is not fun. Each battle becomes just an auto attack for 2 minutes, and takes strategy straight out the window.

Would be nice to be able to actually use skills without having to wait agonizingly long for every single skill to come off cool down, even though you only used 1 Skill.. And then have to wait 2 minutes for that same skill to come off cooldown. Too long and too boring. Fix cooldowns and you might have an interesting game

The game pretty much plays by itself. You enter into a level and it's a one time boss fight and so far that is all there is to it. As far as customization goes you can only equip ruins. I don't think there's an option to change weapon or armor. Lots to read in the tutorial, the lack of voice overs doesn't really bother me. Graphics are good and you can unlock some pretty good main characters, more at level 4. If this was an open world with full customization it would have a been an amazing game. Overall, it's not the worst game on the market!

No reward for pre-register player? Already have 2 master, but disapoint coz cant play 2 master together.. Bad gacha system, need summons stone but still need gold to summon, chance to get hero *4+ very low..

Firstly, the game is beautiful. Secondly,  a way to improve on this game is to let users switch off full auto,  meaning turn based mode,  just like Summoners War.  Thirdly,  prices are way too high on everything.  Fourthly,  game launches with little to no reward. A welcome gift of sorts would be appreciated.  Fifthly,  Some hero voice overs would be nice.  All in all,  a beautiful game marred by the usual greediness of their makers.

This game is a disappointment, coming from all the hype it garnered. Graphics is good but gameplay has no originality and needs no input from the player. If you're into this game and wants more player input (like positioning of healers/tank and DPS during fights) try Velator. Same quality with actual need of player input.. I'm in Velator. Guild Elitists.

descriptionHTML:
A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

■ Be a Light in the Darkness
- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.
- Expand the territory in any direction you desire!
- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

■ Collect Masters & Servants
- Form your Crusade among 5 Masters and over 100 Servants.
- Enhance, Evolve, and Awaken to unlock their true potential.
- Diverse Roles for each Masters & Servants: Attack, Defense, Support, Healer.

■ Devise and Strategize
- Your Master is the key of your Crusade, customize your Master's Skills for every battle.
- Unleash Combo Skills powerful beyond measure with perfect Master and Servant pairings.
- Customize your Rune Combination to gain unique Set Effects.
- Couple the various different Skills and Elements to assemble the most strategic Crusade.

■ Heed the Savage Battlefield
- Pulverize your opponents in PvP mode to prove your power.
- Preserve your Towers! Defense is the first step in strategic combat.
- Challenge yourself to various dungeons and earn rare rewards. Godspeed!

■ An Eerie and Mysterious World
- Not just another RPG! Immerse yourself in a magical and mysterious fantasy world.
- Cute yet bizarre, uncanny yet charming! Masters and Servants are ready to accompany you on your journey.

* Heir of Light Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HeirofLightGAMEVIL
* Heir of Light Official Forum: https://m.gamevilusa.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?1896-English

▶Required Permission Guidelines
When using the app, we may ask permissions for access to provide the following services.

[Required Permission]
- Storage: The authority is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.

[Optional Permission]
- Phone: The authority is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
- Contacts: The authority is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

** This game is available in English.
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support: https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html

comments: Ads are non skipable which is awful. Skippable ads are ones that pop up that you don't want usually. The full ads like on this game are only usually shown when you are getting a upgrade to a boost or something free etc. Terrible design as you can't win either

Gameplay is zero sum. No winning, no losing, and it's not even relaxing because you are just watching ads every 15 seconds. The game is how many ads they can get you to watch until you quit not how many balls you collect. I made it to level 20.
It's pointless, as far as I can tell.
It could be a good concept but there are way too many ads.
This is literally the worst and most pointless game that I have ever played

description: Build alliances and conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies and fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. With a custom palace and formidable army, you could rule the Four Kingdoms! Conquer kings and defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle and build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle and create a resourceful army.Download Empire: Four Kingdoms and join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy and medieval war game. With powerful rulers, fierce battles and strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.Empire Four Kingdoms: TOP 5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD1. Fight enemies and battle rival kingdoms with tons of different weapons & 50 different units2. Build, customize and expand your castle to a mighty fortress. Defend your palace from an invading empire in this MMO war game3. Alliances with kings & other players help you to conquer rival clans and gain territory on an interactive map4. Build over 60 different constructions, expand your palace & produce and trade resources5. Enemies advancing towards your palace? comments: The problem with this game is simple.  It's inconsistent.  It lags at random times, and the hold function is randomized. comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

This game is amazing, a load of fun and very competitive with friends, unfortunately no multiplayer on it.Would love for more Fluffies in the future with different abilities. Also Fluffies you can unlock by doing certain challenges and other stuff. You can also create a level mode where you have challenging levels to complete for coins or Fluffies, and one last thing, you all should have a head to head mode to see who can last the longest going against each other. Those are just some suggestions that I think would make the game even better than it already is.

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! 😊💕

This is so fun and cute! I love the cute little furries, Awesome graphics and simple BUT FUN gameplay. One down side is It's little glitchy while doing levels and maybe some Furries from TV, Disney, books ect.like for an example: Mickey mouse, Pikachu, Totoro ect....If you can fix this I'll rate  it 5 starts

comments: Only problem I have is an overabundance of chests that you get stuck with and can't possibly open them all on time and it makes you lose out on getting gold chests or Diamond chests. It would be really nice if you can choose to dump any of the chests you don't want. Or swap out the ones you have in stock for the newly acquired better ones after a ranked match. Other than that, awesome game

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont

- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

comments: Great game, Love it! Very creative, fantastic graphics. Not so difficult or loss of life's to where you can't even play.  Yet still challenging.  Only negative is lots of ads. Would gladly pay nominal fee to get rid of them.

I really like this game but newer version I have updated to after 3 months and I see the Hooray Sound in the end and some more sounds in between has been changed to Ticking kind of sound.   I seriously and kindly request to the developer to restore those sounds which were there in old versions because I seriously loved it. I wish those sounds can come back which makes the game more amazing.   And ofcourse I still continue to play this and have hope for those sounds to be back.

A truly fun, interesting & free game. A good game for any age. If you need to do something relaxing, this is a good way. You'll get hooked!!! I'm in the 500's & it's still fun! The ads only require 1 more touch on the screen than you have been doing. Well worth it.

Love it !!! Caught my eye when I saw "pick 2" vs. pick 3. I'm a stay at home mom kids in school 6 days week that gives me time to burn   (lol) They did a couple small tweeks which  made the "typical pick 3 concept"a thing of the past (FINALLY) BUT WAS ENOUGH change to make it a keeper

There are way too many ads, it's pretty much unpleasant and unplayable this way. Banners, full screen ad - 1 min gameplay with banner - again a full screen ad, click play next level and guess what? Yet another full screen ad! Terrible

Not a clue if there's a story line, how the power ups work, the difference between the levels or what the deal with the chest is BUT it a cute fun game to pass the time with and relax with. It's challenging but I've yet to get completely and frustratingly stuck. This feels like a game designed for fun not to make money though "buying lives"

comments: I understand that you wanna make more money then you have, but you have ads every 2 plays! 5 games? Okay. 10 games? Great. But 2? Seriously. And then there is that stupid ad bar at the bottom. When I slide across the screen, sometimes my finger goes down, right on the ad. Yay? I think not. Why do you think this game is rated a 3.8?

I love the game but I paid to remove the adds and guess what I still am getting littered with adds that is complete b.s. I want my money back. Paying for no adds and still getting adds. I could and should bring a civil court law suit up over this either fix the problem or refund my money.
God I hate the voodoo developers, they come up with cool game ideas but then just litter the game with ads and ruin it.. I understand some ads but god damn theres an and every 30 seconds.

JUST AWFUL!!! The whole thing stinks. Not because of the app asking me for my card before downloading it, not because of thing being riddled with ads and especially not because of the fact that this is like all the other run if the mill apps that many will play for a bit or so and just get borde and never play it agian; or just out-right uninstaling it. It is all because of one simple reason. The missed opportunity of bounceing on my boi while playing this. I mean, I just can't play this stupid game and bounce on my boi at the same time! I mean are trying to exclude the people who want to bang and play a game at the same time? And you can't do that to us. In fact It all makes me think that you guys are rasist, homophobic and white privileged fascist. And all of that just don't seem right to me, just like 9/11.

I always play games with music in the background and while playing this game my music would be constantly shut off because of the ads, I don't mind the ads themselves, just the fact that it constantly interrupts other sounds playing on the system is very irritating. Gave you 2 stars for a nice game, didn't play a lot though so couldn't tell you more.

Don't bother downloading. Asks loads of permissions that it doesn't require on install. Game would be OK but as others have said the developers have shot themselves in the foot by showing locked ads even when u don't choose to continue. VOODOO take notice of the reviews, less ads will make you more money in the long run cos like me, people just uninstall!!

description: Have you ever gotten so bored that you wanted to kill? Kill time? Meet Ballz, the Pin Man. Pin Ballz will take you on your most entertaining journey of ball-shooting yet! Prepare to aim, shoot, hit and destroy just by the tip of your finger. Swipe your finger to throw the balls and break the bricks.Try to break as many bricks as possible before they move down to the bottom. Collect all the items to get additional balls and make an endless ball chain!The level of bricks will be increased after each round you throw the balls.Angles and numbers are important. Be your angle be that of Sin, Tan, Cos, make sure your target is in line. Keep a look out for the geometric shapes indicating the number of times they need to be hit to completely destroy them. What’s more exciting is that you get to earn power-ups along the way – hit to score them! ◉ Easy, addictive and entertaining – do you have what it takes to reach the last stage?◉ Score power-ups and new balls especially the ‘Mega’ Ball; unlock to unleash its mighty power!◉ Individual and multi-player game options – challenge yourself and your friends away!◉ HD graphics and intriguing arcade music to keep you entertained while you are on your mission to be the bestVery easy to play but very hard to reach high scores.Don't forget the angle is the key point!
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever gotten so bored that you wanted to kill? Kill time? Meet Ballz, the Pin Man. Pin Ballz will take you on your most entertaining journey of ball-shooting yet! Prepare to aim, shoot, hit and destroy just by the tip of your finger.

Swipe your finger to throw the balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible before they move down to the bottom.
Collect all the items to get additional balls and make an endless ball chain!
The level of bricks will be increased after each round you throw the balls.

Angles and numbers are important. Be your angle be that of Sin, Tan, Cos, make sure your target is in line. Keep a look out for the geometric shapes indicating the number of times they need to be hit to completely destroy them. What’s more exciting is that you get to earn power-ups along the way – hit to score them!

◉ Easy, addictive and entertaining – do you have what it takes to reach the last stage?
◉ Score power-ups and new balls especially the ‘Mega’ Ball; unlock to unleash its mighty power!
◉ Individual and multi-player game options – challenge yourself and your friends away!
◉ HD graphics and intriguing arcade music to keep you entertained while you are on your mission to be the best

Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores.
Don't forget the angle is the key point!

comments: After playing now for a while, I really like the game, but cost way too much to be able to really play and advance, only given 4 free rolls an hour, cannot do anything with that, rolls should be free. I have spent a lot of money buying gems so I could buy rolls in order to really play the game. I think it is unfair to your customers. Should be set up better for people to be able to enjoy the game without costing a small fortune.

I like this game a lot and its fun but  it's a little more on the pay to win side,  the amount of time you have to wait for rolls is so annoying especially during events. I understand why some apps need to be pay to win but I just think it needs to be toned down a bit.  Another issue I have noticed is that 80% of the time ads freeze in the middle of playing so I end up having to close the game and try again.  Other than that it's very fun to play in my spare time and the graphics are very cute and vibrant.

I'm having 2 problems with the game. 1: whenever my bunnies have rolls to give me, and I tap to get them, I don't actually receive them. They vanish. 2: When im visiting someone else's board, the game crashes and I lose everything I got into that board such as money, conquered buildings and gems.  It's driving me crazy. Also, I would like for the rolls to recharge every 30 minutes, 1 hour is too much time. I love this game, so addictive.

Update: Most bugs are fixed, my previous issue had been fixed and I'm very thankful for that. I have so much fun playing this game with my friends and have no problem spending money on in game purchases. The only issue right now is that I'm getting kicked out of the game due to connection issues.

I bought a deal in the shop and got extra coins as a prize since my coins spiked to around 1million. Never got a notice saying i got these coins i just happened to notice and was like what the heck, is this a glitch? Then realized it was probably the prize i could get with purchase. 800k was then stolen before i had a chance to use them. We are talking the window of 20sec or less without ever logging off. So I spent actual money on this game and didn't get to use the stuff i spent money on. Poor design that you can have something you paid for stolen within seconds of the purchase.
Hate the new update. It's really annoying when your friends can now steal your money when you are playing. When will I be able to collect enough money to upgrade my building? It cost 800k.
description: Hello and welcome to Board Kings! Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!Join your friends and family in the new and exciting free online multiplayer board game!Meet your board! Choose your idol and throw the dice! Build the greatest city for your bunnies! Throw the dice and earn coins as you go!The dice will determine where you go! You decide what to do with your coins! If you’re lucky you’ll land on the bonus tiles and win awesome rewards and boosts!  But remember, it’s not all about luck, it’s about strategy and skill.Build up your city!Use the coins to build and develop your city! Climb up the leaderboard by expanding your bunny population. The more you build, the more bunnies you will have! Build the most amazing thriving city of all time! The more you build, the bigger the board will become!Protect Your Board!To protect your city from strangers and other unwelcomed mischiefs you need to land on the police station! Upgrade the police station to deploy more police cars! Steal From Your FriendsWin your friends’ coins by landing on the Steal tile! Didn’t find the richest city? No worries! You’ll win other people’s coins as well!Win Bonus Features! Land on the bonus tile and win special features for your board! Extra coins! Extra police cars! It’s always a win to have more than your friends! Visit your Friends’ Boards!Hop on the train and choose the friend you miss the most! You can also pay a visit to others who were at your board. While visiting your friends’ city you can throw the dice and:*** Own your friends’ buildings! ****** Destroy others’ cities! ****** Steal coins by breaking others’ piggy banks! ***Watch out for the police! Or you might get thrown in jail! To be freed you’ll need to throw a double or pay the fine!Become the Board King, now! It’s free-to-play, but you can also purchase additional items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.Any Suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any problems? We love our players! You can reach out to our support team from inside the game!Your board awaits!
descriptionHTML:
Hello and welcome to Board Kings!
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!
Join your friends and family in the new and exciting free online multiplayer board game!

Meet your board! Choose your idol and throw the dice!
Build the greatest city for your bunnies!

Throw the dice and earn coins as you go!
The dice will determine where you go! You decide what to do with your coins!
If you’re lucky you’ll land on the bonus tiles and win awesome rewards and boosts!
But remember, it’s not all about luck, it’s about strategy and skill.

Build up your city!
Use the coins to build and develop your city! Climb up the leaderboard by expanding your bunny population. The more you build, the more bunnies you will have!
Build the most amazing thriving city of all time!
The more you build, the bigger the board will become!

Protect Your Board!
To protect your city from strangers and other unwelcomed mischiefs you need to land on the police station! Upgrade the police station to deploy more police cars!

Steal From Your Friends
Win your friends’ coins by landing on the Steal tile! Didn’t find the richest city? No worries! You’ll win other people’s coins as well!

Win Bonus Features!
Land on the bonus tile and win special features for your board! Extra coins! Extra police cars! It’s always a win to have more than your friends!

Visit your Friends’ Boards!
Hop on the train and choose the friend you miss the most! You can also pay a visit to others who were at your board.
While visiting your friends’ city you can throw the dice and:
*** Own your friends’ buildings! ***
*** Destroy others’ cities! ***

*** Steal coins by breaking others’ piggy banks! ***
Watch out for the police! Or you might get thrown in jail! To be freed you’ll need to throw a double or pay the fine!

Become the Board King, now! It’s free-to-play, but you can also purchase additional items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
Any Suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any problems? We love our players! You can reach out to our support team from inside the game!
Your board awaits!

comments: Not completely sold on the game. Major problem: hoarfrost was not designed for touchscreen! Trying to clear the frost moves the screen, pulls down drop down menu from the top, pauses repeatedly, zooms & unzooms repeatedly...nightmare! Game has too much going on with collections, story, various games....to enjoy the game. I like the parts where I find stuff. The rest just gets in the way and bores me.

It's fun. It reminds me of another game I used to play, not sure if it based on that or by another company. I find the puzzles OK. Some are getting a bit difficult. I enjoy playing it but I get the feeling very soon I will have to spend some real pennies and when that happens I will probably stop playing.

More complicated game mechanics than most hidden picture games, but the game walks you through them very well. Instead of a linear path, you are given the choice of several quests to choose from or you can ignore the quest and play any stage you have unlocked. Completing quests helps you learn more about the game world and its inhabitants. Very enjoyable with several mini games as well.

Good game and great entertainment so far, been playing for about 10 days. Some levels challenging but not enough to be discouraging. Good way to develop focus, observation and memory. Those rubies are hard to get though and expensive in real money...

Addictive game play, with an interesting storyline.   I appreciate that the object placement is random,  although the visibility in some of the special levels makes it particularly difficult to find everything without using hints and tools.  I've been playing now for almost a year, and there seems to be unlimited potential for long-term gameplay

I'm addicted to this game.  You don't have to spend money to enjoy it either.  Illustrated beautifully and I love the fact items move around plus also have different modes to keep you intrigued. I only find it frustrating not having enough energy to keep seeking

comments: This is easily one of the top 5  free game apps I've ever played. Yes, it gives you the option of buying gameplay, but it has more than enough gameplay for free. I can't tell you how many apps I've installed, then uninstalled the same day because of how boring they were or how the only way to actually accomplish anything you have to pay. This game is flat out awesome!

3 stars and I'll explain myself.   1. The game is very addicting and fun, the looks are nice and must I say I love how the northern lights strain look when it's fully grown.   BUT   2. There aren't many strains, would be cool if you could create alot more strain by mixing or idk discovering by accident. Those would add to the game. The game feels like there isn't much to do once you get so far at a given point
Will have to stop playing, massive battery and overheating issues. CPU load is too high. It's just lagging my phone. Shame quite enjoy the game play.

I love this game. Only complaint is that with the latest update I can't rotate my screen the opposite direction. Definitely not a deal breaker, just extremely annoying when I want to charge my phone while paying. Definitely something you guys should look at.

Awesome and fun to play, if you managr your resources well then it doesnt take forever to level up and you dont have to pay to get anywhere. Awesome free stuff sometimes to help you out when you're down, and the story just continues and never loses its spark. Very fun and many things to do other than just grow weed and sell it.
it's a very addicting game that I would recommend to my kids.  Cause it shows them the ethics of real life.  And honestly who doesn't give weed to babies these days...?
description: Let's get growing! Enter the world of Hempire.  Follow the story of Uncle Danny from small-time grower to marijuana mogul.  Make partnerships, upgrade buildings and grow ops, customize your city and become the biggest player in the weed world.Features:* Grow and customize popular cannabis indica, sativa and hybrid strains.* Use the lab to breed and discover new strains and remain at the top of the industry.* Craft extracts like hash and shatter, and edibles like cookies and brownies.* Upgrade your grow op with new equipment, lights, and generators as your business grows.* Complete deals with game characters to unlock new features and strains.* Decorate your businesses with trees, items and vehicles from a dune buggy to race car.* Generate huge cash by selling your custom product in the dispensary.* Invest your money in local businesses and real estate and develop your city.* Start with one bud and grow your company into a billion dollar enterprise.* Multiplayer Competition. The Hempire Cup: Compete against other players to breed the highest quality strain winning trophies in the Hempire Cup.Grow your Hempire. Your pot-ential is limitless. Join us online: * Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hempiregame* Instagram: hempiregame* Twitter: @HempireGame* Website: http://hempiregame.comPlease note Hempire is a free-to-play experience, but some game items are available for purchase using real money. descriptionHTML:
Let's get growing! Enter the world of Hempire. Follow the story of Uncle Danny from small-time grower to marijuana mogul. Make partnerships, upgrade buildings and grow ops, customize your city and become the biggest player in the weed world.

Features:
* Grow and customize popular cannabis indica, sativa and hybrid strains.
* Use the lab to breed and discover new strains and remain at the top of the industry.
* Craft extracts like hash and shatter, and edibles like cookies and brownies.
* Upgrade your grow op with new equipment, lights, and generators as your business grows.
* Complete deals with game characters to unlock new features and strains.
* Decorate your businesses with trees, items and vehicles from a dune buggy to race car.
* Generate huge cash by selling your custom product in the dispensary.
* Invest your money in local businesses and real estate and develop your city.
* Start with one bud and grow your company into a billion dollar enterprise.
* Multiplayer Competition. The Hempire Cup: Compete against other players to breed the highest quality strain winning trophies in the Hempire Cup.

Grow your Hempire. Your pot-ential is limitless.

Join us online:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hempiregame
* Instagram: hempiregame
* Twitter: @HempireGame
* Website: http://hempiregame.com

Please note Hempire is a free-to-play experience, but some game items are available for purchase using real money. A network connection is also required.

description: It’s time for you to meet your favorite new puzzle game: Blend. Brought to you by Last Minute Games, Blend promises endless hyper-casual fun, with easy to learn gameplay, unlimited lives, no time limits, and eye-catching graphics - perfect for a moment of entertainment, or hours on end. Blend keeps it simple - your only goal is to merge blocks to increase their value. Place three blocks of the same value and color next to each other to merge them - vertically, horizontally, or both. You can rotate the pieces for optimal placement - make sure to place them for the most merging possible!When you merge a set of the highest value pieces, you’ll clear a part of the board - make sure you keep merging to keep the board clear for new pieces. If you don’t leave enough room for your new blocks - that’s game over. Challenge your puzzling skills with Blend!
descriptionHTML:

Blend keeps it simple - your only goal is to merge blocks to increase their value. Place three blocks of the same value and color next to each other to merge them - vertically, horizontally, or both. You can rotate the pieces for optimal placement - make sure to place them for the most merging possible!

When you merge a set of the highest value pieces, you’ll clear a part of the board - make sure you keep merging to keep the board clear for new pieces. If you don’t leave enough room for your new blocks - that’s game over.

Challenge your puzzling skills with Blend!

summary: Merge pieces to level up and clear your board!

comments: I love the game!! Thank you so much! It's just what I wanted to relax! so far I play it every day! The 80s neon style is great! I can't wait to see how the game grows! The graphics are well done too! I personally would like to see more trippy lights and colours  reacting to the velocity and frequencies of the songs and  perhaps a bit more speed! Maybe a bit more anti-gravity with some corkscrews and loop de loops, jumps..y'know that sort of thing!Keep it up guys, looking forward to seeing what happens next :D

What an amazing update! I've followed this game since the first time it's launch, and it's getting better and better. Would be much more impressive if you can add Quick Play mode (random race on random music) and an option for premium mode which you can remove the ads (I know you have to earn something from your hard work, but can you consider this? Cuz I'd definitely buy the premium option). Please consider those two and thanks a lot for your amazing work.

[ new review ] The update which was released yesterday has improve the game by quite alot. Still, it'd be awesome to see more improvement to see more improvement on this game [ old review ] This is one of the best game with high quality graphic. Everything in this game is smooth. However. There's too manything thats going on in the screen. It hard to know what to dodge and what to collect. There's no time to react to stuff. Still the graphic can hide it away. But it has turn the game into an uneasy situation.

I love it! I was looking for a game like this a few weeks back, but gave up. Along comes this, with a FANTASTIC 80s vibe! That's just my speed! My only suggestion is that there should be lanes, because I can't quite tell where the points are until they're right in front of me. It makes it hard to plan moves. However, it certainly isn't anything to get you less than five stars. Bravo! P.s: for any Duran Duran fans out there, "the reflex" works BEAUTIFULLY.

I think this game is marvelous but I do think there should be more to it like multiplayer maybe? I also found that I played the retro map more than the first one cause it just made me feel sick and I couldnt see the light cubes properly and it just felt abit too hectic. I also think that the levels should flow better if u get what I mean like flow better with the song. Don't get me wrong though this is a great game but this is just a little bit of constructive criticism

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

comments: This game is an entertaining and super relaxing way to spend time. New pictures are added every day, and there is a large selection of different things to color. If you are reading my review, (Wich you probably aren't) I think it would be really cool if you did some pictures from popular books and movies.

I love it very much. I also have some sugjestons to make. I think you should make categories for Thu pictures (animals,people,food,ect) and also have a daily challenge where you have to finish a picture (that you say) and we have to finish it. You would get a prize of a amount of coins and you could save them up to buy new pictures or tools like the bomb. But i really like this game. So even if you don't do my sugjestons I will still love it. ❤❤❤

And it's just bursting and overflowing with hundreds, maybe even thousands of art pieces. There are hours of fun and relaxation awaiting you, and what a way it is to pass the time. Even better, it is appropriate for ages of all kind, including small children.Overall, I recommend this to anyone willing, for this is truly glorious.

descriptionHTML:
Max Unblock is a fun and classic addictive puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of its way with the minimal amount of moves. Max Unblock comes with 4 difficulties of puzzles. There are 200+ puzzles in total, the highest amount of puzzles you'll find in any logic block game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and hooked.

[How to play]
The red block escape to the exit.
Horizontal blocks can move from side to side.
Vertical blocks can be moved up and down

FEATURES
• 200+ puzzles in total for you to enjoy
• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles
• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
• Smooth and delicate animation
• 4 difficulty level: easy to expert
• Try to enjoy the "Max Unblock” using various devices and screen sizes

Max Unblock have been used in many schools to help improve kids with their brain functions in school and in their pastime. Not only for kids, Max Unblock can keep you mentally fit every day. It will improve your cognitive abilities such as attention, concentration and logic reasoning.

description: 1872, with a steampunk twist. Phileas Fogg has wagered he can circumnavigate the world in just eighty days. * TIME's #1 Game of the Year 2014* "We’ve been dreaming about this future for decades. Guess what? It’s here." - New York Times* "Interactive storytelling as its best" - The GuardianChoose your own route around a 3D globe, travelling by airship, submarine, mechanical camel, steam-train and more, racing other players and a clock that never stops. Featuring a brand new journey - to the North Pole!* "This brilliant interactive novel re-imagines Phileas Fogg's journey around the world... One of the finest examples of branching narrative yet created." - The Telegraph* "For people who love high adventures and good writing, 80 Days is a voyage that must be taken" - The Verge* "A brilliantly paced, memorable and quite frankly terrific piece of modern interactive fiction, that masterfully blends strategy, resource management and adventure" - IndieGames.com150 cities to explore. Detailed research and techno-fantasy combine in an 1872 of tensions, inventions and exploration. Climb the Burmese mountains, trek the Zulu Federation, sail up the Amazon and disappear under the Indian Ocean - but don't fall behind the time! * "This is modern storytelling that engages and delights, and the bold, stylish artwork gives 80 Days almost a graphic novel feel. Pack your case, armchair Passepartout - adventure awaits!" - Joystiq* "Is it a game? Is it a story? Both, really. And a delight." - The Telegraph - Best Novels of 2014* "Could be the best interactive fiction game out there" - 148 Apps* "A sublime video game to immerse yourself in" - The Examiner* "One of the most extraordinarily memorable and unique games I’ve played in years" - Pocket Tactics * "Everything about this game is perfect" - AppAdvice* "Innovative and extraordinary, and unpredictable fun" - Apps Zoom* "Rich with ideas, brilliantly written, and creates a world that you'll want to visit over and over again" - PocketGamer (gold award)Featuring stunning art by Jaume Illustration, a half-million word script by Meg Jayanth, original music by Laurence Chapman, and built using the same inklewriter engine that powers our critically-acclaimed Sorcery! series, 80 DAYS is an interactive adventure created by your choices, on the fly, and is different every time you play.Playing as Phileas Fogg's loyal valet, Passepartout, you must balance your master's health, your finances, and the time, as you choose your own path from city to city all the way around the world. Bribe your way onto early departures, but don't let yourself go bankrupt or you'll be sleeping rough and begging for aid! Trade items for profit, and collect the equipment for the conditions you'll face: but too much luggage will slow you down...80 DAYS is a breakneck race, with an in-game clock that never stops running. Trains, steamers, hot-air balloons, boats, camels, horses and more leave and arrive minute by minute. Every city and journey is narrated via an interactive story where you control every action. Will your choices speed you up - or lead you into disaster? Will you earn Fogg's trust and respect? Will you uncover the secrets and short-cuts that can shave days off your time? Murder, romance, rebellion and intrigue await! The app is network-connected, with a live feed that shows you the position of all the other players of the game, their routes, triumphs and disasters. You can race to be the fastest - or look ahead to learn the secrets of the world.Share your own journey with friends, and load other's routes directly into your app so you can race head-to-head.

1872, with a steampunk twist. Phileas Fogg has wagered he can circumnavigate the world in just eighty days.

* TIME's #1 Game of the Year 2014

* "Interactive storytelling as its best" - The Guardian

Choose your own route around a 3D globe, travelling by airship, submarine, mechanical camel, steam-train and more, racing other players and a clock that never stops.

Featuring a brand new journey - to the North Pole!

* "This brilliant interactive novel re-imagines Phileas Fogg's journey around the world... One of the finest examples of branching narrative yet created." - The Telegraph

* "For people who love high adventures and good writing, 80 Days is a voyage that must be taken" - The Verge

* "A brilliantly paced, memorable and quite frankly terrific piece of modern interactive fiction, that masterfully blends strategy, resource management and adventure" - IndieGames.com

150 cities to explore. Detailed research and techno-fantasy combine in an 1872 of tensions, inventions and exploration. Climb the Burmese mountains, trek the Zulu Federation, sail up the Amazon and disappear under the Indian Ocean - but don't fall behind the time!

* "This is modern storytelling that engages and delights, and the bold, stylish artwork gives 80 Days almost a graphic novel feel. Pack your case, armchair Passepartout - adventure awaits!" - Joystiq

* "Is it a game? Is it a story? Both, really. And a delight." - The Telegraph - Best Novels of 2014

* "Could be the best interactive fiction game out there" - 148 Apps

* "A sublime video game to immerse yourself in" - The Examiner

* "One of the most extraordinarily memorable and unique games I’ve played in years" - Pocket Tactics

* "Everything about this game is perfect" - AppAdvice

* "Innovative and extraordinary, and unpredictable fun" - Apps Zoom

* "Rich with ideas, brilliantly written, and creates a world that you'll want to visit over and over again" - PocketGamer (gold award)

Featuring stunning art by Jaume Illustration, a half-million word script by Meg Jayanth, original music by Laurence Chapman, and built using the same inklewriter engine that powers our critically-acclaimed Sorcery! series, 80 DAYS is an interactive adventure created by your choices, on the fly, and is different every time you play.

Playing as Phileas Fogg's loyal valet, Passepartout, you must balance your master's health, your finances, and the time, as you choose your own path from city to city all the way around the world. Bribe your way onto early departures, but don't let yourself go bankrupt or you'll be sleeping rough and begging for aid! Trade items for profit, and collect the equipment for the conditions you'll face: but too much luggage will slow you down...

80 DAYS is a breakneck race, with an in-game clock that never stops running. Trains, steamers, hot-air balloons, boats, camels, horses and more leave and arrive minute by minute.

Every city and journey is narrated via an interactive story where you control every action. Will your choices speed you up - or lead you into disaster? Will you earn Fogg's trust and respect? Will you uncover the secrets and short-cuts that can shave days off your time? Murder, romance, rebellion and intrigue await!

The app is network-connected, with a live feed that shows you the position of all the other players of the game, their routes, triumphs and disasters. You can race to be the fastest - or look ahead to learn the secrets of the world.

Share your own journey with friends, and load other's routes directly into your app so you can race head-to-head.
developerAddress: 18 Brampton Road, Cambridge CB1 3HL, United Kingdom
recentChanges: "Good news, Master Fogg! I have successfully re-established contact with our fellow voyagers. Once again, their journeys will be displayed on our map as we travel around the world!"
Fogg peered over his newspaper. "And our own journeys—?"

"Conversely and likewise! Although of course," I added with a discreet cough, "our names shall not be shared unless we so choose." As I had become well aware, despite his globe-spanning feats, Master Fogg was curiously wary of his privacy.
summary: Phileas Fogg has wagered he can circumnavigate the world in just eighty days.
title: 80 Days

comments: So far I've been enjoying it. It's nothing too special, typical mobile fighting game but Tekken. The fact that's it Tekken makes it more enjoyable than average because I love Tekken, but that's just me. I feel that acquiring new characters needs to be way easier than it is, especially when you need to take on harder missions for bonus materials and currency. I don't like how you have to wait for characters health to regenerate. If characters healths auto filled per mission, I would definitely put more time into the game. Since it isn't, I have to constantly stop playing and wait for the health to refill, and I don't wait to use healing items because it takes away from my in game currency, which itself is difficult to obtain if you aren't constantly grinding. Aside from that, it's fun. Very fun, I recommend.

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

This game is beautiful! I have always loved Tekken ever since the 1st and have played them all. I only wish some of my favorite characters weren't missing, like Lei and Bryan and I haven't seen Yoshimitsu or Heihachi Mishima. Overall I am very impressed. Thanks, I have been waiting for this on Android for a long time! I would rate 4.5 stars ☺

Am I ever going to play this game?  All it does is download stuff Update:. Graphics are great, game play is ok, seems like I'm just hitting random parts of my screen.  Healing component is going to make me uninstall.  There's no area to practice to figure out what you're actually doing.

Whilst this game is fast to start, cheap, and at free play you can beat it in months, while if you spend a couple of bucks, you can beat it in days, at the most weeks. So basically they sell out this genre for a few bucks, and good riddance! It was fun for a few days, spend few bucks to beat it in few more days, or wait a bit. And thats that. These games can take months to beat, maybe years, what I have done in few days. Dont play.

comments: This was my favorite game as a kid. Of course I played it on NAMCO museum for PlayStation. The controls were perfect and the entire family loved to compete. This version looks the same graphics wise, but these are the worst controls possible! Too small space and the fire button and move buttons aren't very responsive. I looked for this game before and it wasn't in the store now it is. Want to rate 5 stars but please fix the controls first. Too hard to play and enjoy at the moment.

Will change to 5 stars after 2 things are fixed. The controls need to go from a Dpad to a joytick style. And only one fire button is needed. Other than that this is amazing and perfect I will even buy it or donate if these problem are fixed. Also just a little line to show the center of the screen since the score board is on the side. Many classic galaga players rely on knowing where the center of the screen is for bonus stages

I was so happy to find this, but the controls are horrible. I've got the galaxy 8splus and the controls are as big as the screen. Very hard to play. Fingers are tripping all over themselves bc of trying to fire and moving left/ right.  I give you huge props for it being exact, please fix so more of us old people can play! Never appreciated a joy stick so much. 😉

Its the actual Galaga but the controls are horrendous. Please fix asap.  I don't know why they stuck with a d-pad and A and B buttons.  Modernize the controls.  Tapping anywhere on the screen should allow you to shoot.  Sliding your finger left and right should allow you to move.  They should allow for 2 different control options classic and modern.

If the controls were better, this would be 5 stars. This really reminds me of my childhood. I was around 12 years old when this came out. Great retro game that is authentic and gun, except for the controls, they don't respond all the time and the placement is bad.

You should be able to change the on screen controls to your liking, the on screen d-pad has and up and down button that does nothing and it just takes up room on the screen. But this is the closest to the real thing on the whole Play Store and it's still fun.
description: The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.

A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.

Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.

*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
summary: Controls a starfighter to destroy insect-like enemies
title: Galaga

description: Have you always dreamed of joining Alice as she journeys through Wonderland ? In this new Seek and Find Hidden Objects game, your dream comes true! Help the heroine solve puzzles and find cleverly disguised clues so she can advance through this wondrous land!This HOPA game is based on a novel 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland' by Lewis Carroll.  An exciting adventure is waiting for you!Colorful 360 degree scenery, animation, and 3D visual effects will make your adventure vivid and fun. Those with a competitive streak can collect bonuses for speed and repeat the quest with new puzzles. The hidden objects game is TRULY FREE, the whole adventure is open to you without any additional purchases - it's entirely up to you to buy optional tools.Both children and adults will enjoy walking through the Wonderland with Alice. Each hidden object you’ll find could be a hint. Dive into the world of fantasy! Another nice bonus: you will probably reach for Lewis Carroll's classic once again, and if your child has not read the book " Alice in Wonderland " yet, playing the game together will be a sure way to spark interest!This new seek and find hidden objects game from the creators of " Alice Through the Looking Glass " game. comments: I love this game it's so fun and addicting. The highest I've got so far I'm playing 20 minutes is PVC. Whoever the creators are good job. I've never found a game like this. I'm giving it 5 stars. This game will take me awhile to complete great time killer as well.

Why is this game so fun? I accidentally played for 1 hour straight. I usually play games for about 5 minutes until im bored. Please, keep updating this masterpiece. I love the medium-paced gameplay. At least it seems like that. I love it! You even get to choose if we want to watch an ad or not!! I recommend people play this for at least 20 minutes to see how he gameplay goes. Chances are, people only rate bad because they did not even play the game. I create video games myself, and alot of people for some reason either dont play it and rate it bad or play it for 5 minutes and rate it bad. I never rate anything bad unless i have played for 20 minutes straight, and even then i usually never rate one star. Thank you for this masterpiece.  EDIT: I have played for 4 hours. I have a few suggestions now. 1. Please make the watch and ad rewards a little less OP. I know people wont click them as much but then it wont be so easy to get an ice or fire gun. Also, one suggestion i really want to have in this. For you to choose witch gun, drone, or target you want to use. It might sound useless i know, but it can be used for challenges and things like that. Thanks.
Very fun and addictive gameplay but keeps crashing on my device
wow so addictive I CAN CANT STOP PLAYING
What an idiot game.... one star , i cannot give zero
The game had potential  but it it wasn't  done right could have been better but hey...  I at least got what I expected
