Excellent concept with poor execution.  The balance between chassis energy total, equipment slots, and energy used by equipment is hopelessly unbalanced. What's the point in unlocking a chassis with 2 weapon slots that only has enough energy to equip 1?
Had a 5 star before the update. Now it's pay to win. I get that you want to make money from your app but making the game worse than wanting money...poor business decision. Do not download.

It's a good concept but the developers have gotten greedy. The only way to win or advance is to pay money. It was a lot more fun before the update and the requirement to pay for any part to upgrade. Stupid decision, I definitely going to uninstall!

I loved this game. Passed tense. I played it the month it came out and still do. Even tho the devs don't care about the users just the money. Which its there game they can do what they want. But they blatantly disregard what we want and like and give us stuff we have no interest in and don't fix issues.
I get rubbish things even though other people have better things than me an i try and change it and i still lose so unistalling

comments: Transferring to SD is broken, yet again! Almost every other update re-enables transferring the app data to SD. Is it possible to have this feature permanent? Various updates regularly break it. The option is there, but it keeps giving a generic error message. It isn't my SD card, I have a genuine 64GB Samsung Evo Plus. It is definitely the app itself causing the issue, as I could transfer the previous versions fine. And especially as every single other app with the option to move to SD works fine. This is the only app on my phone with this feature that it intermittently doesn't work.
Amazing app if you are in a well populated area. Lots of fun interacting with other players of the community. Have made lots of friends!
Worst game when I was going to  sign in I enter all the things it always say that it is wrong password and username
I'm being forced to upgrade to a version that does not work on my phone. Kind of annoying.

Can you developers make it so people can trade pokemon and other things like items? Itll make the game sooooo much better if teamates could trade items and Pokemon. People did it with cards, atleast to trade Pokemon. My bf and i play along with his friend David and when one of them need something that i got and visa versa, we should be able to trade. If you guys can make it happen, ill give this 5 stars instead of 4.

Honestly i really enjoy the game thus far thank you for all the recent updates niantic... but there is one thing that has been bothering me and that is 1v1 with friends and trading... both features were shown in the original trailer... yet again i love the care your giving the game niantic i truly praise it but i would like to know whats happening with my 2 listed thoughts
description: Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away! Search far and wide for Pokémon and itemsCertain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items. Catching, hatching, evolving, and moreAs you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger. Compete in epic Gym battlesYou’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers. Team up to defeat powerful Raid BossesA Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own! It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!Note: - This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information. - Information current as of December 6, 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.

Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!
Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Pokémon and items
Certain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more
As you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger.

Compete in epic Gym battles
You’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers.

Team up to defeat powerful Raid Bosses
A Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own!

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!

Note:

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information.
- Information current as of December 6, 2017.
developerAddress:
One Ferry Building, Suite 200
San Francisco, CA 94111
summary: Step outside and catch Pokémon in the real world! Collect & battle with others.
title: Pokémon GO

comments: The graphics are good, the controls are immersive...dont feel bad about why i gave only 4 stars because once i played in the tournament mode and the guidelines of the opponent was pointing in a different direction while when he is hitting a ball, it is automatically going parralel towards a pocket. It happened only once; looked like the opponent was hacking the game. He was potting all of the balls like that, and there was also full network. If you can fix it, then the game can be improved.

Best pool graphic wise but the game is not fair what so ever. Game is Controlled you don't decide if you win the game does. Your win percentage and rank don't mean squat. Cues length and force controlled to games advantage even when reloaded. I had 6,991,000 and my win percentage was 61.3 and lost 1 million 5x in a row. How do I have a 61.3% chance of winning and lose so easily by these 40-50% players like nothing. If you don't actually buy stuff with actual money on app game will treat you poorly.

Hey miniclip.. good morning.. i am from india.. i was playing 8 ball pool dubai match. I was just about to win when i hit my solid ball and then last black ball was left but the ball goes in opponents hand said that you didn't hit your ball.. what was that? Can you please stop all these hacks and all for other users. There is no fair gameplay between each other.. please do some favourable to all users.  Hope you will take quick action in this manner Thanks.. Apoorv

First of all It's joyful game few notes need to address it:    1_last 3 weeks is suddenly stopped without farther notification.. And I was about to uninstall it..     2_one of the question was you can play with other users offline. This is not correct!...     3_ need to add "Edit and changing names"     4_Game rated with 5 star.. Than you all 🎱

"Cusion shot on 8 ball" games are great, woukd be cool if one was created at a lower buy-in though.  I think its currently like 8 million needed to play a bank the 8ball game.  I personally like the No Guidline 9ball games,but would love a cheaper bank the 8 game.    Also, well done on adding the upgrade-able cue sticks.  That alone, i think, has made this game much much better.

Likes- 1) The game is pretty addictive.  2) Graphics is good.  3) Variations are cool.  4) Game controls are awesome.  5) You need skills and timing. 6) Stats keeps you update how you       are performing.  7) You make friends while playing.  Dislikes -  1) It's also a game of money so....  2) When you win too many games       you get tougher opponents.  3) Despite having good Internet      connection the game disrupts in      between by disconnecting it.  4) The game starts controlling you        in winning or losing.

comments: I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.

I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. It's pricey but we'll worth the purchase. I kinda wish the pace of customers was a little bit slower so I had more time to prepare the food. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

Love this game. Easy to play. My daughter and her partner both downloaded after playing mine.  When I first downloaded the game I didn't need to have the internet on. Don't know what happened but I know have to be on the internet to start the game but can then turn the internet off. Otherwise happy with it. So many restaurants to buy. And you can get ahead with the casino and keep playing everyday to get more money and gems. Thumbs up from me.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

comments: It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actual online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. I'm not a fan of the game opening apps, especially when all it says is "watch a video". Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Awesome game absolutely loving it. Keep the daily events coming - without them there wouldn't be enough incentive to play every day and there wouldn't be enough stamina. My main recommendation is consider introducing upgrading equipment e.g. 10 bronze fuel cells give you 1 silver fuel cell. Also consider lowering the cost of stamina refill to say maybe 20 gold. Cheers

The game is awesome. But my galaxy core prime freezes every time I play a co-op mission even when closing the app and opening it again it will try to reconnect, once it's reconnected it will freeze again. I know you worked so hard on this game but please fix this.

Nice game ...the only problem  I say would be its pay to win philosophy. Yeah it's easy in the beginning but the gear gets really scarce to if your really trying to win it'll be next to impossible to do so with out swiping that good 'ol debit card. Otherwise it's a fun and awesome game. That is in the beginning....

descriptionHTML:
Ice craft Game, your goal is to survive. Feel like a square head ghost. Experience fear an deep horrifying atmosphere. Exploration of randomly generated cube abondoned, build and create amazing and perfect things from the simplest of creepy homes to the grandest of cube fortresses.

Cubic world of endless possibilities and exciting adventures. Easily place the building blocks you wish to place and build anything you can imagine.

Create unique houses, decorate them for the holiday with various elements of decor and interior in the style of "Ice Craft". Cultivate a pumpkin and show the whole city what you are waiting for this holiday.

Explore all places of the world,collect resources, build tools and weapons,
ensure yourself complete protection from predators and monsters.
Create your own worlds and upload to Multiplayer mode for exploration by others.Play with your friends in real time!

- Exciting adventures in 3d cube world.
- A sandbox game with beautiful graphics.
- Get resources, craft items and weapons, build a house and farms.
- Try to survive in survival mode.

Ice craft : crafting and building , your goal is to build and survive. Feel like a square head ghost. Experience fear an deep horrifying atmosphere. Exploration and building of randomly generated cube abondoned, build and create amazing and perfect things from the simplest of creepy homes to the grandest of cube fortresses.

craft and build unique houses, decorate them for the holiday with various elements of build and craft and decor and interior in the style of Ice Craft. Cultivate a pumpkin and show the whole city what you are waiting for this holiday.

Explore all multicraft places of the world for building ,collect resources, build tools and weapons,
ensure yourself complete protection from predators and monsters.
Create your multicraft own worlds and upload to Multiplayer mode for exploration by others.Play with your friends in real time!

- Exciting multicraft adventures in 3d cube world.
- A multicraft sandbox game with beautiful graphics.
- Get multicraft resources, craft items and weapons, build a house and farms.
- Try to survive in survival mode.
summary: Ice Craft is a crafting and survival game with beautiful 3D graphics.
title: Ice Craft 2018 : Crafting and Survival

description: To Play, Just tap on screen to hook the head of animal to the base. Avoid already present heads on the Base. Be aware of speed fluctuations, We don't want you to loose :) as colliding with existing head will result in a loss of game life and you will have to play again then. It's a simple, amazing and super addicting mini  type game with lots of lovely graphics, sounds and animation. We have more than thousands levels, so you will be loving it as hell because fun is not going to finish any sooner. Play nice and see your rank among friends through social leader-boards, also there are many achievements to unlock, so you can always stand proud among your friends. Get free diamonds, have more lives to play infinitely. Brag about your score by sharing over Facebook. Invite your Facebook friends and play together.

comments: This game really sucks I have tried multiple times to get past the bad blood stage and nothing happens I do everything I can do before I'm stuck with a chain a calling card and 4 quarters. Even with the hint when I try to use the chain it won't do anything!! I have even bought the game to see if that was the problem but it's not
I'm on the "Bad Blood" mission and I can't use the chain on the cop. I even used a hint to make sure I was doing it correctly and I still can't do anything.
Brain teaser but a really good game if you put your head together,took me a few hours to finish it. A very interesting game loved it, 5 stars....
Couldn't play the game. Got to the main menu but there was n ad trying to make me download the prison break zombie. I tried everything couldn't get rid of the ad.
Loved it! To those stuck on Bad Blood-- *DON'T* use hints that stage (and *do* look at the underside of the table on the right)
Game was short, had it finished in a couple hours.  Don't know why people are complaining about not chaining the cops.  I had zero issues with it
description: You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. With no friends among his fellow inmates, you must rely only on yourself.Solve the puzzles, discover the hidden objects, manipulate the prisoners and guards, use your skills, do whatever it takes, and become an inmate who destined to escape..↗ An addictive prison escape game!↗ Solve the puzzles and use your skills to escape!↗ Manipulate the prisoners and guards!↗ Gorgeous graphics and different themed rooms!↗ Addicting mini puzzles!↗ Do whatever it takes to escape!↗ Escape from maximum security prison!↗ Easy and fun to play!Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/amphibiusgames/
descriptionHTML:
You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. With no friends among his fellow inmates, you must rely only on yourself.

Solve the puzzles, discover the hidden objects, manipulate the prisoners and guards, use your skills, do whatever it takes, and become an inmate who destined to escape..

↗ An addictive prison escape game!
↗ Solve the puzzles and use your skills to escape!
↗ Manipulate the prisoners and guards!
↗ Gorgeous graphics and different themed rooms!
↗ Addicting mini puzzles!
↗ Do whatever it takes to escape!
↗ Escape from maximum security prison!
↗ Easy and fun to play!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/amphibiusgames/
developerAddress:
Estonia
Tallinn
Tartu maantee
summary: Become an inmate who destined to escape..
title: Prison Break: The Great Escape

comments: Played for quite awhile multiple 5 start heros. Highest at 75k pow. Had to delete my game reinstalled and my base was gone. Contacted customer support they said since I didn't start a transfer code? I could get my base back. DO NOT UNINSTALL UNLESS YOU WANT TO LOSE EVERYTHING. DO NOT SPEND MONEY BECAUSE AT ANYTIME YOU CAN LOSE IT.  Support was great they fixed everything.

Extremely fun, I had an old account and I was level 27. But I had to get a new phone and did data transfer in time. Now I gotta start all over... But it's still really fun. Just kinda mad that I can't get back to where I was.  Edit: I keep getting communication errors and haven't been able to do a mission all day. All my stamina, gone. I let it refill still couldn't finish a story mode even. I had a good connection too

I only rated it a three because this game needs to fit my screen. I own a Galaxy S8 and to have a title such as Naruto published by Bandai not fit the screen is something I'd think they should fix right away so new players don't have this issue and leave the game. I love the gameplay a lot and the raiding part is fun, I just don't like not having a clue ifnI'm spending ryo or the in game currency.  Please fix this issue.

It is one of the best game I've ever played on mobile. I have just one issue. In this update, the traps don't work properly as before. A person is standing on the trap position but does not get stuck/hit by that. It took alot of time to set those traps and with this new update, all goes into waste. Please fix that.

Please help me to get my data back because my due date is on 10.3.2017 i cannot log in my data using the new phone with the data transfer.please help me fast my old account is level 41.i have log in once and cannot log in it again using the same password please do this fast... Thank you for the best naruto game in mobile...I hope you can reset the game by making the game log in using the id and password which is valid until 10.3.2017.

It's very fun and addictive but there's a bug few and then. I lost my 50 shinobite while summoning just like that because it was stuck at the summon loading page and I didn't even receive any ninja cards. I hope you can fix it and also refund my 50 shinobite at the very least. 😭

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!

comments: Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...
description: Enemies up ahead Commander! Plan out your strategy and the use of Battle Point to outstrip your opponents with your troops in the extended battlefields!Go all out BOOM with the newest RTS type mobile game! Be the commander to your always ready for action troops and epic units and lead them to glory! Take control of the battle and be ready to bring on the BOOM with over 70 different types of units. Whether it is swarming the opponent with infantry troops, blasting your way through enemy defenses with tanks or surprising the enemy with exploding rats! Do whatever it takes to be the one with the best strategy and to emerge victorious! Battle it out and become the most feared commander and expert strategist.FEATURES-   Global real-time strategy battle!-   Enjoy the vast and panoramic battlefield and adapt your strategy.-   Bring on the BOOM with over 70+ units and weapons at your disposal!-   Join forces with your Legion members and battle your way to the top of the world!-   Enjoy the face melting graphics!-   Limitless strategy to blow up your enemies with the use of tanks or unit-producing buildings.*Disclaimer: BOOM is not an addiction, it’s a necessity!Find more information about Battle Boom on:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/battleboomglobal/YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbcdQ5PdY1gI0mm3jdki6cQp>* App permission guide* Android 6.0 and up requires access permission for playing the game. -External Storage (Read/Write)Device, photos, media, files accessThis permission is required for installing the game on the external storage. This permission allows you to install games in external memory in case of insufficient memory.We do not access your photos , media, and files.
descriptionHTML:
Enemies up ahead Commander!
Plan out your strategy and the use of Battle Point to outstrip your opponents with your troops in the extended battlefields!

Go all out BOOM with the newest RTS type mobile game! Be the commander to your always ready for action troops and epic units and lead them to glory!
Take control of the battle and be ready to bring on the BOOM with over 70 different types of units. Whether it is swarming the opponent with infantry troops, blasting your way through enemy defenses with tanks or surprising the enemy with exploding rats!
Do whatever it takes to be the one with the best strategy and to emerge victorious!
Battle it out and become the most feared commander and expert strategist.

FEATURES
- Global real-time strategy battle!
- Enjoy the vast and panoramic battlefield and adapt your strategy.
- Bring on the BOOM with over 70+ units and weapons at your disposal!
- Join forces with your Legion members and battle your way to the top of the world!
- Enjoy the face melting graphics!
- Limitless strategy to blow up your enemies with the use of tanks or unit-producing buildings.
*Disclaimer: BOOM is not an addiction, it’s a necessity!

comments: I did like this game and have just one concern. Why the cost of packs displayed is different from what you are charging? For example the cost of basic heroic ascend pack displayed in game is 2500.00 INR. Where as when I click to purchase I am being charged 3099.00 INR. Please fix it. If the actual price is what I am being charged, then please display that price in the game. I can share snapshot if required. Thanks.

Improvments have been made with the game, I hope to see it proceed further. In closing I hope to see more  strides to improve, and no patch ups.. along with improved response times. The game looks much better, color schemes are sharp too. Great job development team. Kudos to all of you. Thank You..It's awesome. 😊

Graphic is good game play good engine good,just become boring after 2 days of playing. Finding and upgrading gear is like hell hard so best way is to by chest for real mony. Enjoy if you want to spend mony for nothing. In start like it alot bud time show is not good that much. Just fix that a lil and woalaa GG

Awesome game!! Needs to be a bit easier to gain/find/aquire chest keys and cosumables to evolve. As is now ..the process of evolution of player/weapons/armor gets a bit dragged out and a bit confusing... Either way I love the game concidering Im not into role playing ones... Please ..if you (the developers...a.k.a. Masterminds of this game) are updating/upgrading this game..it works out much better to be more action less RPG.

After the new update the game is unplayable sometimes. I get nothing for some succesfully completed missions or fortress attacks, the controls are worse than in the previous version, the attacks don't always go as I aim them. When I click on the promotion ads, there are no promotions, not to mention that I have to restart the game from 10 to 10 min for all the features to work like upgrades to weapons and troops. This game is full of bugs and the new update should've fixed some of them but instead there are even more bugs. I am very disappointed and the customer support is also weak...

TERRIBLE customer service, guys- I've been waiting 2 weeks for someone to get back to me.  I got demoted from level 14 master 2 to level 12 in one single PVP battle. What? I recently gave you a glowing review but this is not good. I tried signing up for a customer account to talk to your team and my email is not accepted. Please fix this and I will happily rewrite my review.
description: Neither fate nor lineage can make a hero -- you must grab your sword and become one yourself!Forge your epic destiny in Iron Blade -- the most thrilling of all action RPG games -- set in a medieval Europe filled with war, discord and magic. Explore a fantasy game world brought to life with console-quality graphics and an innovative -- yet easy to learn -- combat system that is never idle and always throws you into one heart-pounding fight after another!Collect amazing weapons for your monster hunter, explore breathtaking real-world locations and dungeon strongholds to test your skills against millions of other players as your build your own kingdom and engage in exciting PvP challenges.**GAME FEATURES**AN EPIC ODYSSEY - A demonic army of war approaches, and no castle is safe from their discord and bloodlust. This is no time to be idle! Raise your sword, become a monster hunter and fulfill the prophecy to seal them away for good!- Unravel a plot of intrigue and betrayal as you fight through this RPG game's challenging story missions.- Explore a game world rich in lore and set in an alternate-reality fantasy Europe, full of epic warriors, discord and arcane mysteries.- Your RPG adventure games will take you through many awe-inspiring locations beyond any other RPG games, from a fight with Demon Knights in Notre Dame to putting vampires to the sword in a Transylvanian dungeon.A LINEAGE OF WAR- Everyone can enjoy the deep dungeon-crawling RPG action thanks to controls that were specially designed for a mobile game, which allow you to smoothly perform amazing chains of sword attacks in the heat of war.- Develop your fantasy fight style by linking up taps and swipes in the game to perform monster-hunter combos.- Face a fearsome variety of epic dungeon foes, each rendered from beautiful art, and brought to life with amazing game graphics, action and combat abilities.- Unleash deadly special-action attacks and finishing sword-moves that deliver a grizzly end to any who dare to battle against you in war.THE KING OF RPG GAMES- Fight with fantasy weapons and war armor that you can collect in your RPG adventure games.- Upgrade your monster-hunter gear to customize your fighting strengths and war style.- Unleash devastating spells and high-action skills on your in-game foes.COMPETE WITH PLAYERS- Establish your own epic fantasy RPG kingdom that you can fortify with a Castle.- Acquire and upgrade Castle Defenders of the finest lineage to fight off invaders and protect its resources from discord while you're idle or away from the game.- Take action and wage war on other players' Castle strongholds to crush their defenses and loot their most valuable resources for yourself!For fans of RPG games, action, discord, sword-swinging role-playing games, fantasy, monster-hunter knight games, building a castle, defending the lineage of a king, and RPG games that never have an idle moment._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck descriptionHTML:
Neither fate nor lineage can make a hero -- you must grab your sword and become one yourself!

Forge your epic destiny in Iron Blade -- the most thrilling of all action RPG games -- set in a medieval Europe filled with war, discord and magic. Explore a fantasy game world brought to life with console-quality graphics and an innovative -- yet easy to learn -- combat system that is never idle and always throws you into one heart-pounding fight after another!

Collect amazing weapons for your monster hunter, explore breathtaking real-world locations and dungeon strongholds to test your skills against millions of other players as your build your own kingdom and engage in exciting PvP challenges.

**GAME FEATURES**

AN EPIC ODYSSEY
- A demonic army of war approaches, and no castle is safe from their discord and bloodlust. This is no time to be idle! Raise your sword, become a monster hunter and fulfill the prophecy to seal them away for good!
- Unravel a plot of intrigue and betrayal as you fight through this RPG game's challenging story missions.
- Explore a game world rich in lore and set in an alternate-reality fantasy Europe, full of epic warriors, discord and arcane mysteries.
- Your RPG adventure games will take you through many awe-inspiring locations beyond any other RPG games, from a fight with Demon Knights in Notre Dame to putting vampires to the sword in a Transylvanian dungeon.

A LINEAGE OF WAR
- Everyone can enjoy the deep dungeon-crawling RPG action thanks to controls that were specially designed for a mobile game, which allow you to smoothly perform amazing chains of sword attacks in the heat of war.
- Develop your fantasy fight style by linking up taps and swipes in the game to perform monster-hunter combos.
- Face a fearsome variety of epic dungeon foes, each rendered from beautiful art, and brought to life with amazing game graphics, action and combat abilities.
- Unleash deadly special-action attacks and finishing sword-moves that deliver a grizzly end to any who dare to battle against you in war.

THE KING OF RPG GAMES
- Fight with fantasy weapons and war armor that you can collect in your RPG adventure games.
- Upgrade your monster-hunter gear to customize your fighting strengths and war style.
- Unleash devastating spells and high-action skills on your in-game foes.

COMPETE WITH PLAYERS
- Establish your own epic fantasy RPG kingdom that you can fortify with a Castle.
- Acquire and upgrade Castle Defenders of the finest lineage to fight off invaders and protect its resources from discord while you're idle or away from the game.
- Take action and wage war on other players' Castle strongholds to crush their defenses and loot their most valuable resources for yourself!


For fans of RPG games, action, discord, sword-swinging role-playing games, fantasy, monster-hunter knight games, building a castle, defending the lineage of a king, and RPG games that never have an idle moment.
_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

comments: The game is alright. Still too early to give it a proper review. Only here to say that the timers are way too long in the early stages of the game. Waiting an hour or four for thirty seconds of gameplay. They need to work on scaling the progression timers. A game like this is okay with long timers in late game when you have more than one thing to keep track of. But for these pay to win games to be profitable it helps to bait the hook a little harder before making you wait hours for more content.

It's rare I would spend money on a game for my phone but on this one I tried.  Good news is I saved the money and didn't because I can't.  I wanted to buy gems to get the goblin and the store isn't working the customer support links don't work and the main reason for the bad  review is because I emailed them and never heard back. Hate to think how they would treat us after they get our money if the customer service is this bad before they get it.

This game is a solid mix of "clash of clans" and "fallout shelter". Just like COC, you have to learn to let the timers cool off. The long term time investment can be very rewarding. The questing/pvp is also well done considering you can't choose what to attack or when during battle. Wholeheartedly a good game.

Would be a great game if it wasn't blatantly pay to win.  Everything in the game is designed to push you to pay.  I enjoyed it at first and usually toss about $15 since it was decent.   But then, the system pairs you with opponents you can't defeat which then hampers your progress greatly which then means you either pay or hope you don't get attacked too much and lose all your resources.

This is cheat to win, honest people paying still loose  There are so many people cheating, especially the top in clan. they all cheat and use scripts and developer company doesn't even care, they just care rip off more money, and cheaters owns in this game and all the resources. Developers keep those cheaters around just force regular people to pay more money

Tournaments are terrible if you have 500k power 90% of people in the tournoment will have 800k power . If you have 600k others have 900k. I played 136 tournaments and only won 3rd place 3 times and 90% of the time i was 10+ (from 14 people) . Absolutely pay to win. But still fun
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!

comments: This game is highly addictive. The challenges are hard but not impossible. You need patience...and planning. The Chinese new year's event made me used to the shortened energy usage, now that it's back to normal, just doesn't seem to be enough. But maybe that's where the patience comes in. Great game overall, really enjoying it. However finding copper is near impossible on any maps, but it's needed for a bigger backpack and what not.. this is a real pain in the proverbial but..

This game is very well made and a lot of fun. The graphics and controls are great and there are tons of items. The reason I only give it 3 stars is because to progress you need to build a chopper and you have to buy packs to get even a chance of getting many of the parts needed. Without it you simply cannot explore further. Seems like a very greedy way to set up the game. I've already spent money trying to get the parts and I'm nowhere close to being able to finish. Please add better loot and parts to the actual game instead of the store.

Love the game but it takes SOO long to progress anywhere. Plus I think there should be more 'events' popping up to keep it interesting and exciting. It gets a bit boring clearing the same forests and alpha bunker time and time and time again.... Other than that I do enjoy it. Have never had any issues with the updates either just thought I'd add.

This game is very fun and addictive! I got right into it as soon as i started to play. The only thing i would recommend is changing the price of the chests. I feel you would get alot more revenue if they were marked down. The game is going to be alot better when you open it up multi-player. Can't wait for clans.

Excellent game, but every single update comes with a glitch to my base.This time it seems that anyone could open my chest from outside a level 3 wall without breaking the wall. This is great for the raiders but not for me... hope they fix this bug,. Before I go raiding and loose  a lot of stuff.

The game is awesome! But collecting stuff like engine part , wrench,bolts are a huge headache . What do we need 20 engine part for building chopper [Bike] ????? Atleast be realistic. Soon i will be buying iphone so add a feature where i can link my android account to ios bcoz i got a progress of last 6 months and i don't wanna loose it..........

comments: Just finished the game this evening. Overall impression is wonderful. The game play is smooth, and addictive. The controls are just fine. The story line is wonderful; it's very catchy and addicting too. The "Pokemon" aspect that many people seek in games is in this one. You do have the ability catch any monster you encounter, and you do use them to fight your battles. The battle system is set up very well, and it's balanced. The customer service is good, too. I had an issue where I deleted a save file and my diamonds didn't transfer over. The game developer reimbursed me with a smile. I strongly recommend this game to anyone looking for a good turn based rpg game on mobile.

Fantastic game,  amazing art and music,  great animation,  story line is interesting,  only thing I don't like is that the in game screen is too zoomed in and it won't let me progress pass the tutorial of diamond shop.  Once you enter the shop,  you can't exit the shop...  Also the title screen is also zoomed in please fix and ratings will go up.

This game is definitely one of the best pokemon-like games on the app store! The art is great and I was loving it so far, but unfortunately the layout on my phone is the biggest issue. I have a galaxy note8 and things are getting cut off, and sometimes when I click my bag or dex it straight up disappears from the screen when I exit from it. If these minor bugs could be fixed I'd definitely give it a full 5☆ rating!!!

I started to like the game. Graphics are amazing. However, be careful clearing cache etc. You will have to re purchase the full game if you do! I'm unhappy about this. I paid for it TWICE now. Will give 5 stars if refunded at least for one of the purchases!

comments: this truly an amazing game, there's really only a couple of things, why reduce the monster and spell/trap zones to only 3 cards? I wouldn't say it's bad, I just don't see why you'd need to do it.. plus the average deck size of yugioh is between 40 and 50 cards, why limit us to only a max of 30 cards? (not including the 5 for extra  decks) but all in all its a great game! Finally got my six samurai deck!😄 also, I think it'd be an awesome idea to put in a way for duelists to redeem the codes on the cards they've purchased IRL. I bet that'd get even more duelists to play! Just a thought though😊

My app is not opening. I love this game wish you have have out more different cards in the packs. I would like to see swords of reveling light. A bunch of rare magic and trap cards. You should not be able to use Odion's chain reaction duel sense in the PvP duels.

Found Yu-Gi-Oh on Netflix last week and decided to rewatch it. A few episodes in, and my love for the show rekindled, I got eager to play the game myself. I used to play with Yu-Go-Oh cards when I was a kid but it's been about 12 years since then and so all my old cards are in the loft, not that I know anyone IRL anymore who would fancy a game anyway, and not accessible right now... plus I had forgotten most of the rules too. But this app is just what I was looking for: a way to relearn the rules and have a bit of fun. Perfect for whatever skill level you're at with the game!

Real fun,  Only thing that would make me change my review to five starts would be if they allowed 5 slots for monsters and spells and increased the deck size cap.  This is one of the few free to play games I have played where you can make enough in game currency to be good by just playing.

Trash, true fans would never say this game is great. Only 3 monster and spell/trap zones and the person that goes first only starts with 4 cards? Really? Not to mention the terrible camera angles and rigged matches. If you're a competitive player that doesn't like to get bs, don't play this.
THE ONLY REASON WHY IM GIVING 1 STAR IS CAUSE YOU DONT WANT TO CHANGE IT TO 5 ZONES LIKE THE ORIGINAL YUGIOH. Everything else is perfect the unlocking of new cards, graphics, pve, pvp, music etc...

descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above

description: Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress. Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.Try to top the leaderboard.Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress.
Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.
Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.
The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.

Try to top the leaderboard.

Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
developerAddress: Central Manchester
recentChanges: New Feature added to make it a little harder and more enjoyable. Thanks for playing!
summary: Relaxing Gameplay
title: Balls Blast

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

Good concept, but wont really teach you anything about coding. Lacks the ability to change anything once a loop is initiated, aside from resetting all your work. Game is also very short and puzzles tend to vary from hard to easy and back again with little reason. There is also a lack of a hint option for anyone who is stuck. Game has potential, but seems more like an early beta release.

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Great puzzle game. Good for introducing programming concepts in a fun way. Suggested improvements: A way to break out of infinite loop without losing work. Also noticed that steps cannot be edited after pressing stop part way through simulation. Hats off to the devs overall. I'm looking forward to future puzzles.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.

comments: I've been playing candy crush for close to 4 years. Today I'm on level 3139. For the very first time I got the jackpot on the daily booster wheel. Thought it was impossible to get. Have read other comments saying no jackpot ever. Well today is a first for this challenging, sometimes very frustrating game. I play every day just to keep up with the free boosters. It's a free game that is fun.

It's a very lovely game with nice graphics and I love the challenge and the difficulty, it helps you to think and make good choices but I don't understand why I will have to buy the gold bars that I earned playing the game. That's not just right. There should be options to buy additional gold bars not telling me my gold bars is filled and I need money to get it

It's really addictive,like I'm a Sugar Crush- aholic :-)  But..... I had collected 60  gold bars and I couldn't get them unless I paid 2.99. So I wasn't to impressed by that. But nevertheless it's a great game so keep up the good work. Two thumb's up for me

It keeps telling me my "gold bars are full" when I do well, but wants real cash when I try to use them. I refuse to spend real cash on an online....but addictive as hell that I am tempted to! Advise...If you have the sliqhtest of addictive personality. Stay away....

Not so keen on the  graphics, the actual sweets are OK,  but, the puppets etc are not so good. It can take ages, days in fact to win the super hard games if you don't,  like me, buy help, and the free help you have earned are used up in the first go. So it takes perseverance.  Good game.

Gripes: 1. The option to skip Sugar Crush takes a LOT longer to come out than before. Should come out almost as soon as Sugar Crush starts. Big waste of time and battery life. 2. Decreasing # of moves/time in levels that are already difficult to start with making it virtually impossible to finish them without boosters. 3. There should be shortcuts to earlier levels for those of us who want to revisit them to get more stars/better scores. Becoming increasingly necessary as the total # of levels is approaching 3000.

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Nice game Not true curling but closer then any game I have played so far and it's still fun.  There seems to be a glich where stones jump to a different position after the throw, but doesn't happen often.  There is no hog line violation and it's difficult to promote so most games end up being a culster f in the 4ft.  Once you realize it's a game and not real curling your addicted.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: Dude it doesn't even work wow. A 13 year old made a game and even THAT worked you suck. (Edit) if I could put zero stars I would do it in a heart beat
Really great game! I don't usually write down reviews, but this game is amazing. The only bad thing is the bad hitbox of the nails. It's really tony. Other than that, it's great!!

It's a fun game... when the frame rate isn't terrible. My complaints are: the sound design is awful, it's very low quality; the music doesn't go for very long before it loops; the saw level doesn't have any good skins. Otherwise it's quite addictive, plays best with the sound off and the Wi-Fi so you don't get the ads (which aren't too frequent, but they're there).
This game is fun. It's a great time killer. That's what it's for. All these negative reviews are from people who play more in depth games. That's not the point of the game. It's relaxing.
I think it a good game going do.ewhere but fix  the bugs and improve the saw system plz and if your looking for a time killer this would be a good one
Simple yes, exciting? Not at all. Update games still simple and dull after 2 minutes
description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

comments: After the update there are still some things that could be fixed so you can read it and maybe like an explanation to how to play or what to do. Over all this game has a hell of a lot of potential. A+ on the music though, more tracks would be amazing but the music is the best ive seen, they dont even have that in fallout shelter.

I like it. I just started playing and it asked for rating. So far I see nothing wrong with it. I mean, the to English translation isn't full, but whatever, we all need to learn a few words at least of other languages. So it's nothing to complain about.  So far I haven't been able to successfully keep radiation levels down while simultaneously keeping needs up...but as I stated, I've only been playing for a few minutes.   I like this game.

Super broken. Can't upgrade weapons or armor. Impossible to read near impossible to understand. If more work is put into the game I'll change my rating but as sits this game should never have been released.

I like that you listened and translated the game to English! Many more people can play and enjoy this very good and cool game! There are still many spelling errors and some words appear in Russian, but the game is now much more understandable and enjoyable! Thank you!
Well the game is a bit boring, I think it needs some more animation. Not a bad concept but with a little polishing and some background music it will be perfect 👌
I really enjoy this game, the English translation is good but has some words misspelled. That is to be expected since the translation is in beta form. Keep up the good work!

comments: Why is it that when you add new levels, I get kicked back to the first round in the legends arena? Totally unfair that all the progress I've made gets completely erased. Now that this has happened for about the 3rd time, it makes me want to uninstall

Seems like they took away the tree house and treasure map for this legend thing. It's nice to have extra levels to play while waiting for new levels, but I liked the side challenges too. It's basically impossible to earn gold now.

Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. Of course, I suppose that's by design so I spend money. Which I won't do. I just want some "bubblegum" to past the time.  Now, it's making my blood pressure rise...  Also amazing how many 5 ⭐ ratings they get in one day without the user giving explanations on why. Seems suspicious...  Oh, how I hate the legends arena stages...

Love this game! Fun, addictive, challenging. I only wish lives weren't limited. I hate getting stuck on a level for days or even weeks because you only get 5 lives at a time... unless you want to buy more with cash :(
Love it. Addicting. Some levels were hard but by taking a break I'd usually get it when I went back to play or have my sister beat the level for me
Use to love this game. But once you get up in level 1500's, you're forced to play in an "arena" for 12 days. And when it ends, you have to update app. Pretty disappointing.

comments: It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

This is an idle game with effort and pretty fun writing, with a lot of ways to feel rewarded without cracking your wallet. It's obviously not the driving game but if you want an idle/clicker, you can't really go wrong with this one. The character diversity is a genuine highlight more games could take a note from.

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. 👌👍❤

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

description: Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level. With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:- Each player has two serves in a row- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead- During this overtime the players alternate after every serveYou control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible. But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.Features:- 3D Ping Pong- Table Tennis World Tour- Realistic Ping Pong Physics- One of the best sports games- Choose your own country- Become the Ping Pong Master
descriptionHTML:
Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level.
With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.

You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.

The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:
- Each player has two serves in a row
- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead
- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead
- During this overtime the players alternate after every serve

You control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible.

But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.

Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.

Features:
- 3D Ping Pong
- Table Tennis World Tour
- Realistic Ping Pong Physics
- One of the best sports games
- Choose your own country
- Become the Ping Pong Master
developerAddress:
Schanzenstr. 6-20
51063 Köln
Germany
summary: Win the World Championship in this 3D Ping Pong Game with realistic physics.
title: Table Tennis World Tour - The 3D Ping Pong Game
