description: Come and play the most exciting Coach bus driving game where your bus driving skills will be put to test! Complete challenging missions, pick and drop passengers and upgrade your bus for better driving.Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 gives you a realistic bus driving experience in big open world city!Play the latest coach bus driving simulator game - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018.Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is an exciting, action packed bus driving simulator game.Detailed coach buses, realistic interiors and a beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like you are driving a real bus! Get behind the wheel of the Coach bus and drive around the big open world city to complete all the routes! Each level of Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is more challenging and more exciting than the previous one! Your passengers are waiting for you! Drive carefully to the pick up spot, open the bus doors, let the passengers board the bus and then drop them to their destination. Drive carefully because every time you crash into traffic your bus will get damaged and the passengers will scream! Make sure you drop your passengers before your bus is completely broken and damaged!Change the camera view as per your comfort to the sturdy exterior or the realistic plush interiors.Play the career mode of this truck simulator, make money and purchase new buses and upgrades for your Coach bus.FEATURES - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 - Real life traffic  - Beautiful city environment - Challenging missions - Different grand Coach buses to drive - Realistic Coach bus physics - Stunning 3D graphics - Realistic Coach bus interiors - Realistic game sound effects - Easy steering wheel, buttons and tilting controls - Fresh attractive musicExplore the beautiful city in your Coach bus and become the king of the road!Get Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 now!
descriptionHTML:
Come and play the most exciting Coach bus driving game where your bus driving skills will be put to test! Complete challenging missions, pick and drop passengers and upgrade your bus for better driving.
Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 gives you a realistic bus driving experience in big open world city!

Play the latest coach bus driving simulator game - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018.
Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is an exciting, action packed bus driving simulator game.

Detailed coach buses, realistic interiors and a beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like you are driving a real bus! Get behind the wheel of the Coach bus and drive around the big open world city to complete all the routes!

Each level of Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is more challenging and more exciting than the previous one! Your passengers are waiting for you!
Drive carefully to the pick up spot, open the bus doors, let the passengers board the bus and then drop them to their destination. Drive carefully because every time you crash into traffic your bus will get damaged and the passengers will scream! Make sure you drop your passengers before your bus is completely broken and damaged!

Change the camera view as per your comfort to the sturdy exterior or the realistic plush interiors.
Play the career mode of this truck simulator, make money and purchase new buses and upgrades for your Coach bus.

FEATURES - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018
- Real life traffic

- Stunning 3D graphics

- Easy steering wheel, buttons and tilting controls
- Fresh attractive music

Explore the beautiful city in your Coach bus and become the king of the road!
Get Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 now!

comments: Freedoom is the best DOOM clone, that is available on Android (and possibly iOS)! I absolutely adore this game! Odd controls, however, you may configure your controls, and place the buttons where ever you feel comfortable placing your fingers.  This game has so much originality being a DOOM clone. Cool weapons, mysterious locations, bad@$$ enemies, and amazing music!  Definetly give this game a try!  Freedoom: 8.5/10 EXO 4/5 EXO  Love it!

I've been waiting a long time for a game like this. It delivers very well. Had to turn down the sensitivity for mobile play, but I'm sure I'll get used to it. I love how there are options to make it more like the original game. Very well done, guys.

I find Freedoom to be one of the best doom clones to play, and it even comes with a sequel! What's also great is that you can use other WAD files to play more levels or custom doom stuff like brutal doom and even the original doom! The controls are simple and feel great as well. One of the best and underrated DOOM apps of all time in the play store

Good port of GZDoom, runs great, can load multiple .WADs at once, every feature is here and works perfectly. Bonus points for including a button to bring up the keyboard, since some .WADs use additional keybinds for opening menus and such. Too bad it's not Zandronum though, would've been fun to have it's great multiplayer functionality.
Have to get used to it if ur not an old-school gamer. Never really played doom but I still got into it.

Works amazingly well and the controls are not terrible once you get used to them. Needs keyboard if you want to use dual weapons with mods like brutal doom. But that being said, mods work, original wads work, all in all it's probably the best doom source port on android! Well done!
description: Why Freedoom?While the game engine for everyone's favorite game from 1993 and its many spinoffs are open-sourced, most of its "assets" such as textures, sounds, and game levels are copyrighted and not legal to redistribute. The Freedoom project offers an alternative set of assets and game levels that are entirely original, open source, and can be used with most engines of said 1993 game. In addition, Freedoom is compatible with most of the vast library of fan-made "WADs" (i.e. game levels) as indexed in the idgames archive.This app is a fork of nvllsvm's GZDoom-Android port. My idea for this fork was to bundle this app with the open source Freedoom (freedoom1.wad and freedoom2.wad) assets to publish a completely open source android game running on the GZDoom engine. I hope this "bundling" will allow it to reach a more diverse audience of users whom either don't own the OG awesome 1993 game or are averse to having to find and copy their legally-owned game resource files onto their phones.Most custom wads can be played by:1.  placing them under Freedoom/config/wads2. Selecting the desired wad from the main screen by pressing "Addons", "WADS", then your desired wad3. hit "OK", then select the main game resource file to use (usually freedoom2.wad)4. hit "Launch"5. start a "new game" as usual, but you will go to custom level instead of the normal first level of the game6. (alternate) some levels replace other maps than the first one in the game and may require use of a warp command or special launch argument to get to itFull game mods should be placed in Freedoom/config/modsDISCLAIMERThis project is not affiliated with Id Software or parent companies, Bethesda, or any relevant publishing companies.More info:https://github.com/mkrupczak3/GZDoom-Androidhttps://freedoom.github.io/index.html
descriptionHTML:
Why Freedoom?

While the game engine for everyone's favorite game from 1993 and its many spinoffs are open-sourced, most of its "assets" such as textures, sounds, and game levels are copyrighted and not legal to redistribute. The Freedoom project offers an alternative set of assets and game levels that are entirely original, open source, and can be used with most engines of said 1993 game. In addition, Freedoom is compatible with most of the vast library of fan-made "WADs" (i.e. game levels) as indexed in the idgames archive.

This app is a fork of nvllsvm's GZDoom-Android port. My idea for this fork was to bundle this app with the open source Freedoom (freedoom1.wad and freedoom2.wad) assets to publish a completely open source android game running on the GZDoom engine. I hope this "bundling" will allow it to reach a more diverse audience of users whom either don't own the OG awesome 1993 game or are averse to having to find and copy their legally-owned game resource files onto their phones.

Most custom wads can be played by:
1. placing them under Freedoom/config/wads
2. Selecting the desired wad from the main screen by pressing "Addons", "WADS", then your desired wad
3. hit "OK", then select the main game resource file to use (usually freedoom2.wad)
4. hit "Launch"
5. start a "new game" as usual, but you will go to custom level instead of the normal first level of the game
6. (alternate) some levels replace other maps than the first one in the game and may require use of a warp command or special launch argument to get to it

Full game mods should be placed in Freedoom/config/mods

DISCLAIMER

This project is not affiliated with Id Software or parent companies, Bethesda, or any relevant publishing companies.

More info:
https://github.com/mkrupczak3/GZDoom-Android
https://freedoom.github.io/index.html
recentChanges: App now automatically creates folder Freedoom/config/mods to make it easier to install full game mods (IWADS)
Most individual level(s) (most WADS) should still be placed in Freedoom/config/wads
summary: A free and open source game on the GZDoom engine
title: Freedoom

comments: The food should provide more energy per dollar as it gets better, not less. 5 energy food costs 5 dollars, 10 energy food costs 12 dollars. How does that make any sense? What possible incentive is there to not only buy the cheapest food?
It's ok it's both harder and easier than the first game but it'll improve with time.
Great! Better than the first one!

Why did you abandon the first game? I feel like it was more realistic and had far more features. It was really good and could have been polished and updated, you had a good one on your hands. Are you planning on adding in some of the features that you had in the first game? This one just seems downgraded. Overall, it's still better than 99% of life simulators, I just wished you had continued to build on the first one.

I love this game. Just as good, if not better than the first. Reading through the negative reviews, I find most of their reasoning for bad ratings to be silly. The developer is super helpful and friendly. I'm looking forward to spending a long time on this game and possibly replaying it's predecessor.

The game is nice and all, love everything about it, it isn't annoyingly stupid to make money. However, recently when trying to buy food, it came up with saying I didn't have money, even though i pulled 72 dollars from my bank. It said that for all except Ramen, that said I didn't have space (my fridge is completely empty) I restarted the app, and now they all say i dont have space.
description: Welcome to the second entry in the Life Simulator series! New and improved visuals, game play, and performance!Life Simulator 2 is all about moving up through the world by going to school, getting a job, and eventually running a successful business! Of course, it's also about amassing the most wealth you possibly can. In Life Simulator 2, you can even see how you compare to other players on the leader board and earn achievements based on your progress!You can reset the game and start over at any time to earn a multiplier based on your current life's progress.Tired of all those other life simulating games that just leave you wanting more?Look no further! Here, life is good!Life simulation is a fun and addicting way to make your life whatever you want it to be!All the other life simulators out there just don't hit the mark for me. I set out to create a game that you can play to pass the time while you're doing what you've always wanted to do.As in real life, the fastest and best way to make a ton of cash is to run a business or play the stock market. You can even blow all your money gambling at the casino!When you reset, your score is calculated based on how successful you were. A multiplier will be applied to your next life based on this score.Each life is better than the last, if you play your cards right. It's better than real life, it's better than your life, it's simulated life!Download now, and leave a review if you enjoy the game!Support for tablets added!Things to come in next updates include:-More of existing content (majors, items, jobs, casino games, etc.).-More achievements.-Any other suggestions people might have for the game in its current state!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the second entry in the Life Simulator series! New and improved visuals, game play, and performance!

Life Simulator 2 is all about moving up through the world by going to school, getting a job, and eventually running a successful business! Of course, it's also about amassing the most wealth you possibly can. In Life Simulator 2, you can even see how you compare to other players on the leader board and earn achievements based on your progress!

You can reset the game and start over at any time to earn a multiplier based on your current life's progress.

Tired of all those other life simulating games that just leave you wanting more?
Look no further! Here, life is good!

Life simulation is a fun and addicting way to make your life whatever you want it to be!

All the other life simulators out there just don't hit the mark for me.
I set out to create a game that you can play to pass the time while you're doing what you've always wanted to do.

As in real life, the fastest and best way to make a ton of cash is to run a business or
play the stock market. You can even blow all your money gambling at the casino!

When you reset, your score is calculated based on how successful you were. A multiplier will be applied to your next life based on this score.

Each life is better than the last, if you play your cards right.

It's better than real life, it's better than your life, it's simulated life!

Download now, and leave a review if you enjoy the game!

Support for tablets added!

Things to come in next updates include:

-More of existing content (majors, items, jobs, casino games, etc.).
-More achievements.
-Any other suggestions people might have for the game in its current state!

description: Welcome to viking village! Let’s explore racing tracks and prepare for the racing championship. Become a part of viking legend and leave your footprint in the racing history!FUNNY CARSChoose one of the unique viking cars - be sure to try all of them and find your favorite. Play enough to unlock all cars - you will get new hidden car from time to time. All racing cars are well crafted and ready for unpredictable race! They are armored with viking horns and viking shields in case of a  golem attack. MISSIONViking village is the regular place for golem and viking wars. You have to avoid furious golem and viking warriors. They will try to overtake and prevent you from the victory. Watch out for explosive obstacles and falling stones. Drive carefully on wrecked road, jump over the road gaps and overcome muddy road sections.You are the last hope of peaceful vikings. Become a real viking warrior and win this racing championship to finish golem and viking raids. Be aware of viking ships while racing. Mysterious longships can chase you! descriptionHTML:
Welcome to viking village! Let’s explore racing tracks and prepare for the racing championship. Become a part of viking legend and leave your footprint in the racing history!

FUNNY CARS

Choose one of the unique viking cars - be sure to try all of them and find your favorite. Play enough to unlock all cars - you will get new hidden car from time to time. All racing cars are well crafted and ready for unpredictable race! They are armored with viking horns and viking shields in case of a golem attack.

MISSION

Viking village is the regular place for golem and viking wars. You have to avoid furious golem and viking warriors. They will try to overtake and prevent you from the victory. Watch out for explosive obstacles and falling stones. Drive carefully on wrecked road, jump over the road gaps and overcome muddy road sections.

You are the last hope of peaceful vikings. Become a real viking warrior and win this racing championship to finish golem and viking raids.

Be aware of viking ships while racing. Mysterious longships can chase you!

WHAT TO EXPECT:

◆ Intense viking race
◆ Funny cars
◆ Interesting gameplay
◆ Simple controls
◆ Full of action viking game
◆ Viking vs golem fights

CONTROLS

Drive funny cars and enjoy this awesome viking game. There are two worlds: Viking village and Golemberg. Each world contains 12 levels. Challenge yourself and finish them as fast as you can!

◆ Ready, set, GO with the start button and enjoy fun viking race.
◆ Use ARROW buttons to make cool stunts, front and back flips.
◆ Come back to play the game everyday and collect as much coins as you can. Use them to claim new cars and unlock new world.

Invite your friends and family members to play viking game together. This viking race game is free to play for everyone.

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Viking race game is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy fun car racing and IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

MINI GAMES

Need a short break from vikings? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.

NOTICE

This game of vikings is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.

◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆

Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search Tiny Lab Games on the app store and discover even more fun games!

Learn more about Tiny Lab Games and contact us at the following:

comments: So after spending countless hours playing this and building my trophies and league up to gain max gems instead of adding more leagues you demote me almost 10 leagues and my daily reward is diddly squat now. And I most of my tokens have been reduced after I had built them up. I almost had Barber bugs up to 400 tokens. Starting to hate this game 😡

Hey guys, so my favourite character is Tazzy Devil. Now you advertise him as a character in the game, I don't know if your going to update it or not but he's not in the game as of yet. Just wondering what's going on with that? If he's not in the game why advertise him?
Please include tweety bird on the character. 😍😍😍👍👍👍  Bad update though toon task can't be collected. What just happened? The heck, its too hard to level up. The pieces are too huge.

The new update has changed a lot of mechanics and features and it really feels odd from an old player and a Looney Tunes fan standpoint.  For instance, I might understand Porky Pig being moved to WB Studios, because he has had roles before such as a talent caster, but Road Runner?  Wile E. Coyote?  Ralph Wolf?  Really?  Even placing Marvin's house in WBS seems totally odd and questionable, that, ignoring the fact that the Space region is a thing in the universe.  The task mechanic also makes less sense.  One task point even for larger tasks?  And what about the Toons' houses?  They don't even change form after each upgrade and the "bigger loot" incentive still does not apply beyond Level 3.  Also, we kinda know for a fact that the wheels are rigged, but with the current update, you can't really make it more obvious.  I still love the game, but definitely less than before.
The latest update has again reverted my progress while suddenly gifting me some toons I haven't earned. I don't understand what the Devs are trying to do with this, but what a mess

Like the league store tho I wish it will sell more items used for upgrades. The league ranking was messed up due to the updates made. Players with 5000+ trophies are in higher leagues  than that of players with 12000+. Also,tried playing same invasion stage 3 times wasn't able to win the material that I need, did you change the probability again?!

BMX Freestyle Extreme 3D 2, is the sequal to the first BMX FE3D game.

The sequal has a massive upgrade to graphics, physics, animations, and pretty much everything else.

Awesome freestyle BMX game in 3D.
Go blast the skatepark to earn points to upgrade and customize your character, your bike and your skills.

Ride fast, do manuals, slides, flip tricks, grabs, wall rides and all the other tricks you can imagine, and line them together for insane combos like the pros!

Customize your characters clothes and BMX!

Earn skill points to level up your characters skills, like jump height, spin speed and more!

Play 3 different game modes: Arcade Mode, S-K-A-T-E Mode and Free Run!

The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!

comments: This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

The game is rigged for you to lose so you will buy gold pieces. I only made it to 300,000 gold before the bottom fell out.  Every match I played was against a person or computer that would hole out from 200yrds every time. Hole in one on almost every shootout. Nice game but very rigged no matter what the idiots from playdemic say. Better HONEST golf games out there. Funny I only rated it 1 star yet is has 4 stars. Also rigged

Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

First of all I love the game, I play every day. I especially love the tournaments. But now I have to congratulate you guys, you are brilliant. You took a push one button to go between guest and Facebook accounts, and changed it to pushing 20 buttons. And now you have to leave the game and go to the Facebook app to push most of them. Apparently you're not happy about two accounts. I don't know why, I spend twice as much money.  Tech monkeys, gotta love 'em.

comments: Overall, a very addicting game and great quality. I probably would have given five stars if there wasn't a little girl screaming loud af everytime I'd go on a score streak. I like to listen to my games when I play them, because it makes me more focused to be able to hear what I'm doing, when I'm doing it. But with this game, it's not possible for me to do so without getting extremely irritated. Not to mention the rediculous amount of ads this game has. Literally every time you want to play you have to watch one. I mean yes you can skip it, but you still have to wait five seconds, give or take, to do so. Ugh.😖

I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¶:

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope– you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

description: Get ready to ride down the slopes and shred the fresh powder in #1 3D winter sports game on Android! comments: It was fun while it lasted. I was a big fan of the first game and this one was an awesome improvement. Unfortunately my game crashed after months of playing and forced me to play the tutorial again. UPDATE: After reaching out to Pikpok customer service they reset my story progress and gifted me several leveled up weapons that help balance out what I lost. I appreciate their rapid response and look forward to playing more!

After i reach chapter 4, suddenly all my weapons progress are gone,  then i contact the support team,  and they dont restore my previous weapons,  but they give me MORE than what i have before. 😄  I really happy with this,  and i really appreciate this.  You guys should try this game. This is AWESOME. Now it's time for me to kill more zombies 😎

3 stars because although the game is fantastic in what it is, it needs optimization for slightly older devices such as my S7 Edge. I had to scale down to 720p screen res to be able to get a good enough framerate. And yes. I already tried playing on low graphics settings (in-game) before i changed my phone's resolution.

I give you guys a 5-star rating. The graphics are amazing. And the weapons are cool. The only thing. I wish we didn't have to have the stamina constraints. And it would be awesome if I was able to keep the extra ammo I find so I have it for future levels. And also its a pain in the ass to level up the guns all the damn time

OMG. I definitely LOVE this. Better than the first. The storyline had me excited. Now it's more fun running with a goal. Love everything. I'm on the lowest graphic settings but I still encounter minor lags. Oppo A83. But that's fine. I love how you can name your companion. Makes it more personal. Good job!

Excellent game. I am totally addicted to it. Developers can you please include a reload button. Also sometimes playing I hit a wall or fence and it becones impossible to move left or right. In that case moving a couple of steps backward coukd save us in the game. Please include these options for making the most out of it. Overall its an excellent game and I highlh recommend it.
description: The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?FEATURES:• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the fieldExternal storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all usersInto the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDeadInto the Dead 2 requires the following permissions to access game expansion files:Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storageStorage: read the contents of your USB storage
descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

FEATURES:
• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges
• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!
• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot
• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities
• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!
• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes
• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the field

External storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all users

Into the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDead

Into the Dead 2 requires the following permissions to access game expansion files:

Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
Storage: read the contents of your USB storage

57 Willis Street
Wellington
New Zealand 6011
recentChanges: - YEAR OF THE DOG! Play the next major event to earn the exclusive Golden Retriever companion!
- Dog Training! Collect treats to adopt and train your companions and improve their skills!
- Survival events now have companion point bonuses.
- Companions now unlock after stage 3. Collect and train them all!
- Fixed instances of excessive flashing on some screens due to user input.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: Kill zombies & run for survival - the ultimate zombie apocalypse action shooter!
title: Into the Dead 2: Zombie Shooter

comments: i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

I think it is hard for few people to purchase it. I personally love thus game but cannot purchase it. I hope and request game house to remove those purchase things will be removed so that I can play easily and so as other people.
Love delicious Emily, Fabulous Angela and Hearts Medicine. I'll always buy them and I can't wait for the next game to come out.
description: Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved onesWill you be there for Emily when she needs you most?Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:🌟 Delicious - Emily's Message in a Bottle: https://goo.gl/PEyYzG🌟 Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears: https://goo.gl/NlFYvf🌟 Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat: https://goo.gl/VOLClp🌟 Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal: https://goo.gl/pkAp5J🌟 Fabulous - Angela's High School Reunion: https://goo.gl/UmfsOC🌟 Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever: https://goo.gl/czC8qo🌟 Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets: https://goo.gl/u7TEij🌟 Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911: https://goo.gl/XNV042🌟 Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion: https://goo.gl/xQRE0y

Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.

description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: Big fan of Beyblade since I was a kid, from the first generation. So this is cool to play this game and see how far its came. Though there are many glitches in the game, this is the second time I'm gonna have to download because it won't open. Overall, it's a fun game when it's not glitching

Garbage game,is now infinitely looping on a challenge tournament. Once I defeat the first opponent the screen goes black and the game freezes. Reopening the game puts me back in the same match and ends in the same endless loop.   Dev team needs to fired and a patrol of lemurs hired instead because they'd at least be entertaining.

As much as I love Beyblade, this app is really disappointing. The gameplay isn't anything special but the worst is the players. There should be a serious punishment for disconnecting. I cannot enjoy the game - I should have won two matches but I got nothing for them because my opponents disconnected the last second. Truly unsatisfying.

Everything is great but it can there be like a story mode cause just battling that is kind of boring. Still I think that the app is great, still could use a story mode where u can customize your own cherareter
You really don't do anything but press orbs and press to buttons. Plus, just to get cool stuff, you need to go out and buy only beyblade bursts. The game is boring and confusing.
Greatly improved since launch. Achievements are bugged and some Beyblades don't have the correct Bit Beast yet, but most earlier bugs have been fixed. Online play is also a big plus.

comments: The only way i would give this game 5 stars if there was an option to walk around instead of pressing an arrow to jump from cover to cover that ends up breaking cause your enemy's keep shooting at it. You bring all these amazing features but you take away the most important feature in any shooting game: walking around and taking cover where you like.

It is fun and challenging I find myself returning to play constantly to reach another level and build my team I love my mercs. I like having to find the materials too. Often going back to previous levels needing three stars for best advantage. Only problem I have is with cloud save I can't log in successfully and you must exit game to save data to your phone leave any other way all current data is gone. lOVE the game Good job.

Well executed game.  Items are there only for quick power freaks.  Looking forward to seeing the add one for the game.   PS- The English in the game isn't great and could use improvement.  It doesn't affect gameplay,  just a bit nerve wracking,  😉

You'll know right away if the game is bad just by reading the dialogues. If the English is bad, chances are the game is bad too. I have proven this many times already, and I know many other players have too.

Its not a bad game, its actually just like the rest of the shooters on google play, which is point and shoot type of games like Zombie Frontier. I bet this game would be a lot more fun if you could walk around instead of just sitting In one place which is my only complaint. But otherwise overall this game is rather a bit fun if you are looking for a time killer.

Great game with decent graphics, but would be expensive to have good weapons.  I dont understand how they charge so much for stuff. Balance cost to what a person could spend on a console game with access to all the weapons.

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

Was addictive so I spent 25 over 5 weeks. Not knowing there are no rules on who hits who. High level player just continue to beat down on low level player. Nothing to even it out except spend money. Shame on you game designers

Not a great game. Played for half the day. Game will no longer start and tells me to make sure I'm connected to the net. Oh I'm really that dumb. World chat is more like a dating site and is not child friendly. The admins do nothing to stop the behaviour in world chat. I strongly advise you not to allow your kids anywhere near this game

descriptionHTML:
Solitaire Collection is a BRAND-NEW collection of various solitaire card games, which contains Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid & TriPeaks(TriTowers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks).


⚡ HIGHLIGHTS ⚡

- Classic Solitaire Gameplay:
We kept all the games true to the spirit of the classic solitaires, and specifically optimized the games for an unmatched solitaire experience on mobile devices.

- Fun & Addictive Challenges:
Solitaire card games are fun and challenging puzzle games that anyone can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple to start but hard to master. Millions of users have fun for hours every day all over the world!

- Beautiful Designs & Customizable Themes:
By removing all the unnecessary features, our game is the most easy-to-play with clean and intuitive designs. Meanwhile, we have added 100+ beautiful themes on top of the classic card game design.

 
✅ INCLUDES ✅

- CLASSIC SOLITAIRE
In Classic Solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience), try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode. Don’t forget to try the Vegas scoring mode as well!

- SPIDER SOLITAIRE
Play with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits. Try to collect them with fewest moves possible!

- FREECELL SOLITAIRE
Win a game by creating four stacks of cards, one per suit. The secret of winning is the extra four cells!

- PYRAMID SOLITAIRE
Combine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the Pyramid and clear as many boards as you can!

- TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRE
Select cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals!

- DAILY CHALLENGES
Looking forward for more challenges? Try to solve all daily challenges! The challenges are guaranteed solvable and will be updated every day!

- TOURNAMENT
Join the tournament and play against real players from all over the world, practice your skills and get the first place in the weekly rank leaderboard!


✨ FEATURES ✨

♠ Daily challenges with different levels
♠ Customizable beautiful themes
♠ 2 Players Tournaments
♠ 4 Players Tournaments
♠ Up to 10 top records
♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card or 3 cards
♠ Standard or Vegas Casino scoring
♠ Timer mode
♠ Left-handed mode
♠ Landscape mode
♠ Multiple languages supported
♠ Single tap or drag&drop to move cards
♠ Auto-collect cards on completion
♠ Auto-save game in play
♠ Feature to Undo moves
♠ Feature to use Hints
♠ Play offline! No Wi-Fi required
 
Like playing Patience or Klondike Solitaire on PC?
It is surely the BEST solitaire collection in your hands!
Train your brain as well as kill time with friends together!

COME and TRY our Solitaire Collection for FREE!
★★★ 100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! ★★★

Email us to support@solitairegames.freshdesk.com

comments: Alright, so the game is pretty good. All I ask for is more tricks, and the ability to upgrade some bonuses (coin magnet, feather hover thing, and the third one that I haven't grabbed yet.) All in all, if you could do that, it'd make the game so much greater. Apart from skipping missions and revives there's no use for coins.

Good graphics, but can get boring after only like 3 minutes. Also the makers of the game should add a another different mode where your running away from a villager/camper and see how far you can get. You could improve or modify this mode that i have made if you want

The thing that makes this game great is the visuals and the audio. It is absulutley beautiful and the art style works so well with the type of game. Without this the game would not be nearly as good as the game play I'd very simple but it would still do ok. However these features are what makes the game. Also the fact that there's a night and day feature gives the game an even bigger opportunity to show the beauty of its art style

First off, I'd like to give a big thank you to the developers for this game. It's amazing.  However, I've been encountering quite a few bugs lately. One day, picking up a hover feather crashed the game. Today, I can't pick up llama horns, and the background blur that happens when you go into the workshop stayed into an actual run. I took this as a challenge and continued playing. I'm on a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 9.7 running Android Marshmallow.  This is just to tip you guys off on some bugs.

The game is addictive, but i cannot play it more than 10 minutes at a time, because it gets boring. The awful part is that since 1 week, i dunno why, it crashes while i'm playing.. Anyway, it's addictive because after you start playing, you start thinking about it while you're not playing

So idk what happened with a recent update, im a premium player so maybe it was in that update but my game will randomly force close now, thought it might have just been my phone but recently got a new phone and it is persistent. Can you guys please look into a fix, i love this game and the force crashing seems to be happening more frequently
description: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.Features:• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)Reviews:"A piece of interactive art"– WIRED"One of the best mobile games"– The Verge"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"– IGN"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"– TIME

comments: Unbalanced PVP so frustrating you want to rage quit. Gems buys you worthless things you can get for free.  Weeks never getting anything you need to advance! Spent over $80 and could never get anything but things I already Had, or didnt need. Dont waste your money time. They are greedy developers, and they are looking for more suckers like me. Dont mind spending the money to support the game, but  when you spend your money and get basically nothing for it and cannot get past where you have been stuck, why play even for free. Waste your time? For Sure! Just dont waste you money!

DON'T INSTALL THIS GAME...it's just another money machine. I'd played this game for 4 month and the amount of money you have to spent to be able to level up your teams is endless. You will pay for an lootbox system and be sure...it's just a money machine with ridiculous prices...this is far away from free to play... The leveling management and so called game meta is simply stupid..."Do you wanna lose a raid-match when your team is on 3000 and the other on 2200 points." ...ridiculous. Updates are just "price enhancements" and new modes which are only playable if you spent more money.

I've played this game for quite some time now.  I've spent a good deal of money and have enjoyed it up until now.  The basic gameplay is fun but if you want to be competitive it is a must to spend money.  The most frustrating part though is spending money and getting nothing in return.  I've been waiting for mats for a couple five stars for months.  The problem is you're not rewarded for what you put in it is all about luck of the draw.  An unlucky person like myself could spend a lot and wait forever to see any benefit

I changed the rating of this game. With the constant updating it starting to tweek out. And it's getting impossible to finish levels. It's like way to long and to much to level up heros. Being stuck in higher provinces for a month is ridiculous. And the constant raids of losing more trophies to lower heros is bull. It was a fun game, but it gets boring being stuck on one level for months.

Out of everything a few hours in. Complex and stingy. Slow, tedious  progression. Very random luck on  gameboard with too few gems shown to have any matching strategy.  Relies on random matching of gems falling. Uninstalling.

The game seems to be rigged. When I purchased something to respect the developers as I do development itself. Got a few good epic summons, ever since then it's been 2 months, 8 elemental summons later, and 5 more epic summons using tokens, all I get is Bane and Dawa and other 3 star junk, that you get rid of them str8 away. Debating quiting. Frustrating, time consuming, not rewarding.

comments: WOW. This game has everything! My only complaint is that the "earning" free in game currency section (downloading and playing other games to certain level), does not yield in game currency, so do not bother. Just pay for stuff when it goes on sale. But otherwise, WOW! This is like fanfic, sims, empire, battle, idle, all in one! Hpw often do you get an all in one game based off an amazing franchise?? (As of this date, ive been playing for 2 months, spent $10)

First everything went out smoothly. Now the assets keeps on redownloading everytime I try to play it. My phone still has 7gb free memory, I also tried following ghe suggestion to clear up some space it still doesn't work. But overall it was awesome. I just hope the issue of redownloading will get fixed asap.

I know the update on The Book of Dragons came out a long time ago, but I still can't make sense of it. The old book of Dragons was a lot easier to understand. If you filtered it to show only searchable dragons, then it would show in order what you unlock. I'm not sure, but from what I understand is that the dragons are now arranged in time to search. That's neat and all, but could you please come out with a filter for dragon unlocsks by Lvl?  Dragons unlocked at a later Lvl is usually better. With the current filter, you can find a dragon which collect 14 mill wood/hour with dragons collecting 1.05 mill wood because it is arranged by time to search. Again, please release a filter option by Lvl unlocked? Thanks for your help!

Love the game. Just wish it gave a little more direction on what and how to do certain things. And wish you didn't have to wait hours sometimes 19 to hatch an egg. But they do give you the option to pay to speed up the process. Also wish that they weren't so stingy with giving ruins/coins to pay for things they ask you to do.

I really prefer  the old version of  this game like how you'd have a dragon and you'd guard a wagon and collect gold and fish and some time a new egg. And if a dragon attacked you'd battle it and have to tilt your tablet to fly aim you fire blasts.could you add a dragon racing minigame

I love it even if it's not real I don't care though and I think it could use an update about more dragons and more offers about coins and ruins but free ones cause no likes spending money on games unless they last forever so keep up that good work.  And one more update that the dragon and grand dragons like foreverwing and more but make them cheaper with ruins and what ever more .  And I love the game u should get it.

comments: Is it just me or does this happen to everyone? When I use a power up like 2X or instant bingo, does it land on the same number? I had an "instant bingo" land on B9 on three different cards (B9 was never called)! Same with most power ups! Just curious!!!

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Okay, I play these games when I wake up and this one costs a fortune to play!!! Then, I have found with the challenges it doesnt give you credit as it should for utilizing the power ups you bought. I just used two for a challenge, and it never registered. If youre willing to dump money this is the ideal game  Oh and you cant reach support through the app to discuss these mistakes so....youre SOL when the game messes up. After spending oodles on this game, time to delete.

comments: A superb implementation of sudoku, with an intuitive and helpful interface. It would be nice to allow us to input our own sudoku, but other than that, this game is complete. A big minus is that the adverts come with sound; this is disruptive and entirely unnecessary.

Now that it is possible to pay to remove ads it's a 5. Minor issues: the note highlight should be a dimmer colour than placed numbers, it should not be possible to put a note over a placed number, or at least this behaviour should be a selectable option. If these 3 things are sorted out it will be a five star from me.
Just AWESOME, the design is incredibly good and the themes feature just stunning. My new favorite Sudoku app by far. The only thing I wish it had is handwriting recognition.
Great app and the best for Sudoku and I'm updating my review to 5 stars for the option to remove ads. I bought it and am happy now. :)
THE TIME TO BE A TRUE GAMER IS HERE!! prepare your ANUS
I'd give this a perfect score if there was an option to buy to remove ads. 3-5-18 edit: they added an option to remove ads. Sweet! Goes to 5 star for me!

comments: This game has no logic, you can shoot through walls and whoever wrote "SHOOT WITH SMASH EVERYTHING" should go for English classes. And every time you clear a level... Your game freaking crashes. And restarts the app, this is hella bad. Overall, I say this is the worst game ever.

Stone3DGames. Can you maybe add grenades and a rocket launcher or something major explosive that way us players can enjoy massive explosions on free mode? That's why I only gave it 4 stars. Its really cool otherwise. I love how the stuff looks like confetti when you blow it up.

The amount of ads in this game is disgusting.  Everytime you hit pause, clear a level or just do anything in the game and ad pops up. For that sole reason I'm going to one star all of the  games by Stone3dGames.
Fun to play when you're mad.  Pretty easy but also repetative.  The bullet time really adds a cool effect and makes it more fun.
One thing i would change is the reload.Make a button to have no reload time its a good for  stress relief
Esta bien pero falta que pongan un mercado,si para comprar mas armas,balas,etc.y mas escenarios y que incluyan a gente...

comments: Overall, I love it but it would be helpful if we could get something like a monthly subscription. Maybe like 10-15 characters fragments plus 10-15 gems or something. It would help us be less grindy. It would help with collection and able to get legendary easier plus monthly revenue. I would love that. Compare to MFF which is a lot more hectic, you guys a bit more generous. Just please don't put any paywall characters. Hated that.

It was a great game until they introduced Deathstroke. Now you either need to have him(I do but it takes the fun away) or have people specifically to counter him. They made him way OP and arnt nerfing him anytime soon. So if your just starting you will want to spend money to counter death stroke.

Agreed that DS needs reworking but not frm one of the best to the weakest. Developers, do you even play your own game?? Wasted my $$ & time invested in him. I don't even have lobo if you think I use the 'lowbo' combination in pvp

It just won't work. I used to play a long time ago.. Wanted to resume my progress. I downloaded it and the main screen came up. When I select a menu option the screen goes black and stays like that. Do something about please

Upgrade superman please, he is so weak.. i  have Lvl 52 Superman with Lvl 7 gear but his overall is still lower than Lvl 50 Cyborg, Power Girl or even Jessica Cruz with Lvl 4 gear. He is the weakest energy character even though i invest a lot on him.

Ok, maybe this is a minor nitpick. But some of the legendary costumes look really bad. It is worse on characters that look good before the upgrade. The detective Batman and comic Harly Quinn are the biggest examples. I would rate higher if they gave us the ability to hold the apperance. Maybe add another level and costume and let players choose which they like best.
description: YOU CAN’T SAVE THE WORLD ALONE - Join your favorite Justice League heroes and villains in epic RPG combat.Recruit Justice League heroes like Batman, Superman, The Flash, Wonder Woman and more in the ultimate DC experience. Join dynamic PvP battles and form alliances to clash against rival teams as you fight your way across the galaxy. Empower your heroes with epic super power attacks,  improve their stats and upgrade gear as you gain experience.  The future of your team is in your hand - use strategy and wit to dominate your opponent, defeat enemies in battles, and save the future of the galaxy.  UNITE your favorite Justice League heroes and join the battle today! ASSEMBLE POWERFUL HEROES• Good and Evil? Superman and Lex Luthor? Batman and The Joker? comments: Great game! I love the challenge and not having any tips or help at all. Just 2 things need to change ! First the jump and sit button, make them bigger for better control, and change the look😂 I mean srsly "!!" Means jump?!😂 And second add an option to record the game and share it. I noticed there is one, but it doesn't work.

Guys, this is an amazing game! Seriously, only problem the jump button is EXTEMELY unresponsive.. especially on the swimming levels, is this a design choice or a small bug, because on the normal land levels its "ok" still horrible but on the swimming levels its extremely unresponsive and is hard to stay consistant. This is the games biggest flaw. Its EXTREMELY unresponsive

Hardest game i've ever played, but i completed all of the current levels,best game ever! waiting for the new levels! Stop crying about levels 8 and 9, they are easy! you just need to learn the pattern, after I learnt it now I can beat the game with ZERO DEATHS! So if you can't do this it dosen't mean it's impossible you noobs!

Love this game! I have beaten both new and classic levels and they are awesome. The spinning line of blades that go up and down the screen in Level 8 is especially brutal, and took me several tries to beat. To everyone saying its impossible, its not. Just keep trying and you will get it. Overall just a fun mobile game.

Great don't know why people are complaining about difficulty, just got to learn the patterns. There is a glitch though that doesn't let you access the third submarine (level 11?) level half the time. Get a game in development screen instead
Nice game but the devlopers are greesy wont let you play if you dont pay. By annoying ads every two seconds or cash. Too bad. Could be a successful game.

description: Tank, which is a fast-paced 3D tank game, includes 4 different modes, can meet the different requirements of players. Different colors correspond to different players.The game is based on Open GL, the Ultra-HD display which could make you see the shape of the tank more clearly. Also the operation is simple. Tanks will be auto-rotation during the game, the players should control the fire direction/moving direction through clicking on the button, which need higher skills.There are different barriers in the game scene, the players could use the barriers to avoid bullets from opponents, or push your opponents away and make them to show their slip, and then shoot them.Come and handle the tanks to defeat your opponent. To be the supper tank hero through fighting with the foxy enemies!
descriptionHTML:
Tank, which is a fast-paced 3D tank game, includes 4 different modes, can meet the different requirements of players. Different colors correspond to different players.

The game is based on Open GL, the Ultra-HD display which could make you see the shape of the tank more clearly. Also the operation is simple. Tanks will be auto-rotation during the game, the players should control the fire direction/moving direction through clicking on the button, which need higher skills.

There are different barriers in the game scene, the players could use the barriers to avoid bullets from opponents, or push your opponents away and make them to show their slip, and then shoot them.

Come and handle the tanks to defeat your opponent. To be the supper tank hero through fighting with the foxy enemies!

descriptionHTML:
Over 300,000 people love playing Mahjong Quest! We hope you will feel the same!

Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hiddenmahjong/

Enjoy A relaxing mahjong game
Our standard and expert levels are designed in ways that guarantee they will always be solvable. Hints are always available if you need a helping hand.

Collect and craft treasures
When you match crafting component tiles, you will collect the items. At the end of each level, you can open 1-3 to treasure chests to get even more materials. Combine the crafting items into a treasure which you can sell for 100,000s of gold coins!

Our Mahjong Game Features
-Easy to play mahjong mechanic and hint system
-520 levels (260 normal and 260 expert)
-260 beautiful pieces of artwork which can be downloaded
-1040 Bonus levels
-Rescues and upgrade a cute companion creature!
-Daily rewards
-Every level uses different tile sets
-Replay for high scores
-Earn coins and unlock more boards
-Become the mahjong master

Dungeon Level
Every land has a dark boss dungeon level to complete! It's dark in the dungeon but you will earn HUGE coins for completing it!

1040 Bonus Levels
Open the Blue spheres for 260 Bonus levels with tricky emoji tile faces!
Open the Red spheres for 260 Bonus Expert levels with emoji tile faces!
Open the Green spheres for 260 Bonus levels where you match 3 tiles at a time!
Open the Yellow spheres for 260 Bonus Expert levels where you match 4 tiles at a time!
*Every time you unlock a normal or expert level you get 2 of these bonus levels to play for free!

Rescue and upgrade Lumin!
Lumin has been trapped in the Mansion. Once freed his power will help you earn more coins. Lumin can be leveled up 4 times! And more in future updates! :)

Star Bonus System
Every star collected gives bonuses! Get progressively larger rewards from your globe, daily reward, wheel spins, map treasures and crafted items!

No wifi or internet access needed to play
Enjoy your Mahjong Quests everywhere you go without needing an internet connection.

Your Mahjong Journey Across 14+ Maps
*We add 2 new maps every month!

Mystery Mansion
Levels 1-20 Begin your quest revealing creepy haunted houses and mystery mansions!

Halloween House
Levels 21-40 It's that spooky time of year again, check out what's happening at the Halloween House!

Monster Mash
Levels 41-60 A collection of images of various monsters like trolls, nightwalkers and other creatures of all persuasion.

Grim Tales
Levels 61-80 Relive classic Halloween stories and beautiful created artworks!

Hallows Eve
Levels 81-100 Celebrate Halloween by wearing your best costumes such as witches and wizards, and go trick or treat!

Twilight Fantasy
Levels 101-120 Move into the realm of vampires! What are these ancient creatures up to in the mansion?

Pumpkin Patch
Levels 121-140 Advance to the world of Jack o-Lanterns with different types of pumpkin carvings!

Halloween Time
Levels 141-160 Continue your adventure and explore more spooky scenes but look out for spine-chilling realms and monsters!

Happy Haunts 1
Levels 161-180 Take in the haunting sceneries and bravely enjoy the beautiful yet creepy artworks!

Happy Haunts 2
Levels 181-200 A sequel to give you more haunting experience, more goose-bumps down to your spine!

Trick or Treat
Levels 201-220 Now it's the time for Halloween costume for kids! Make a choice... trick or a treat?!

Scared Sweet
Levels 221-240 It's time to be scared sweet and observe all different Halloween things!

Mystic Moonlight
Levels 241-260 Look at the beautiful scenes illuminated by the light of the moon!

Spooky Travels
Levels 261-280 travel through spooky haunted Halloween locations!

And many more, rapidly approaching 400 levels!>/b>

Follow us on Facebook for the latest news and updates!
https://www.facebook.com/hiddenmahjong/

comments: This is a really good game. I tend to be cynical about mobile games because they're usually pay to win these days but this game seems to have a very fair progression system. It's also refreshing that it's single player. That seems to be getting rare these days. My one suggestion is that there be more levels and things to do. I've only been playing for 4 days and I'm already nearing the end of the campaign. Add more missions or maybe another game mode and this game will easily earn 5 stars from me.

Great time passer! This is one of the better helicopter games I have played. The sound effects are realistic along with graphics and gameplay. No regrets or bad feelings from me. This game is on both phones and my tablet. Love it!

Game is good but am stuck in level 18 kill all enemy and have detected one area Buuuttt can't detect another area damn Stuck here play every day still cannot proceed to the next level do you hear my problem game developers please fix this issue if you can do it.
Too many bugs on chapter 4 and 5. Always showing ads pop up on 4-3, so many sinking ship still running and bombing on 5-4, and sometimes the game suddenly shutdown..

It's great overall, but two months in a row, I have been carefully and patiently waiting for the sign-in rewards to get a better machine gun, and like others have noted, my daily sign-in calendar reset both times. I won't be waiting another month.

comments: I would've rated it 5 stars if it was somehow faster. I just want to fastforward all the animation that is happening there. I mean I saw it the first time. Great. I got it: "cat jumps into a boat and then goes underwater, after that it goes out". All this animation takes more time than the actual playing. Same thing with letters: I get letters every time. And I've stoped reading them cause there is a lot of text and I have no idea what for. Inspite of that - it's a good game. Nice and simple

I think this is a really cute game so far. Nice time waster. Couple of problems with reading letters, sometimes it will say "new" and nothing is there, or I try to read the letter and it ends and I can't scroll. Another plus would be to add how many fish are needed to get gold in the fish trophy category. Overall, still a really cute game. Worth the install no doubt!

Ads aren't a problem in this game. As for the game itself, my girlfriend and I love it. It's a good time waster and it can get pretty addicting. Some reviews expressed annoyance at the price of upgrades, but we have almost fully upgraded our gun and tank and it's been fine. We get about 40,000 each catch so far, so exchanging for parts is no big deal. Maybe people just haven't figured out how to be more efficient.

This game is just perfect. It has a complete free to play style and doesn't force ads upon you, instead, they are completely optional to get extra currency or more time. You could go through the entire game without watching a single dad if you wanted to and I love these types of games. The graphics are adorable and the controls are easy. I highly recommend this game.

Fun and relaxed game that I can easily see myself spending hours sniping fish. There is a bit of strategy to the game with the changing weather, predators, and upgrade system. Blindly shooting your harpoon will just lead to short, frustrating sessions so its best to learn the mechanics quickly or you'll end up with pretty sad catches. Thankfully, its a straightforward game so most should have no problem with it. With all the features, its well worth an install/play. Bonus? The ads are entirely optional and provide YOU bonuses.

It's a really good game. Perfect if you want to kill some time in a relaxing way. The only problem I have seen is when the game crashes sometimes while showing an ad. Other than that, the devs of this game did pretty good!
