comments: When I downloaded this game years ago I someone deleted it it might of been me but I doubt it. Anyway I was searching tank games and i didnt know want what to download so I scrolled down AND I SAW THE GAME I was so shoked, happy and exited. So I was quite idicting to me so i was completely completed with downloading games and my games nearly so I would recommend you to download this games. Also i want it like you can report people if they hack or use a the ruler. Good luck!:)

Finally! A port from PC to Android! I have been playing this game for years and am so happy to see it finally come to Android! Is it possible for veteran players who've paid in the past for full versions to get any kind of deal or special weapon packs? That's seriously my only complaint right now. LOVE THE GAME and thanks for porting it.

I remember this game from years ago. I just found it on Android now. Truly great game!! I like the scaleable A.I., the ability to get rid of ads AND get free weapon packs with deluxe purchase, plus reasonably priced extra packs, the ability to play offline, and the absolute FUN of this game. What makes it exceptional?...  The randomness of each game, plus the unpredictability of the wacky weapons, meaning no game is really the same. Excellent work on this game! Highly recommended.

Its a great game. Except for the fact that there is stuff missing from the game. There should be death and suffocation and more movement like jetpacks. And there should not be so much stuff unavailable to people who dont want to pay for the game. And online play is so confusing. First time I played I didn't know what to do for some time and I didnt know you had to leave the lobby to get to the game. There should be a button to get directly to the game.

Totally reminds me of Charr that I used to play on the Commodore Amiga back in the day.  Absolutely loved it then. Graphics look more or less the same.  I believe the Amiga version could have up to 8 players on a map at any one time either AI or human players.  The game is definitely worth downloading.

Deluxe dosnt even cover half the weapons. so rather than wanting the 2/3rd i dont have.  i want a refund. Edit i uninstalled and and now deluxe is gone do not buy this garbage if you ever uninstall you lose deluxe never will i play pocket tanks again nostolgia defeated. And replaced with greed.
description: "The Ultimate One-on-One Artillery Game" – Now with cross-platform ONLINE Play!Pocket Tanks is the fast-paced artillery game that is simple to learn, and fun to master. The perfect quick game for friends and family, you'll find yourself hooked for hours of play! Bury your opponent in a mound of dirt, or assail him with a barrage of bullets. Visit the Weapon Shop before battle to arm yourself for the struggle, or try the Target Practice mode to learn all the weapons and the best tactics to win.Experience the thrill of launching volley after volley of powerful and fun weapons across the battlefield, using very simple controls. Select your angle, power, and FIRE! Your arsenal of unique and useful weapons includes: Napalm, Firecracker, Skipper, Cruiser, Dirt Mover, and dozens more! descriptionHTML:
"The Ultimate One-on-One Artillery Game" – Now with cross-platform ONLINE Play!

Pocket Tanks is the fast-paced artillery game that is simple to learn, and fun to master. The perfect quick game for friends and family, you'll find yourself hooked for hours of play! Bury your opponent in a mound of dirt, or assail him with a barrage of bullets. Visit the Weapon Shop before battle to arm yourself for the struggle, or try the Target Practice mode to learn all the weapons and the best tactics to win.

Experience the thrill of launching volley after volley of powerful and fun weapons across the battlefield, using very simple controls. Select your angle, power, and FIRE! Your arsenal of unique and useful weapons includes: Napalm, Firecracker, Skipper, Cruiser, Dirt Mover, and dozens more! This is the light-hearted game of heavy artillery for everyone.

-----------------------------------

Download Pocket Tanks COMPLETELY FREE, and learn the ropes with 40 exciting weapons. The Free version also includes WiFi AND Online play, to challenge your friends wherever they are.


Upgrade in-app to Deluxe and receive:
- 100 brand new weapons (140 total with all free packs)
- Jump Jets for moving your tank around
- Bouncy Dirt for creating reflective terrain
- Digger for tunneling your tank underground
- Support for weapon expansion packs, both paid and FREE!

Plus...
